Name: The Hornitos Hot Shotty
About: Añejo tequila and spicy chili powder give a kick to this spiked hot chocolate.
HowToMake: Add the tequila and hot chocolate to a half-pint glass. Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a dash of chili powder.
Ingredients: Hornitos Añejo Tequila;Hot chocolate

Name: Heras Crown
About: This cocktail has so much flavor you won’t miss the alcohol.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a shaker. Fill with ice and shake. Add the club soda and gently roll the shaker back and forth to mix. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Grenadine (Fee Brothers);Orange juice;Lemon juice;Club soda

Name: Patrón Pineapple
About: Tired of Margaritas? Try this simple tequila and pineapples juice cocktail.
HowToMake: Pour Patrón Silver Tequila and Patrón Citrónge into a rocks glass full of ice. Fill with pineapple juice and finish with a squeeze of lime. Garnish the drink with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Patrón Silver Tequila;Patrón Citrónge Orange Liqueur;Pineapple juice;Lime

Name: Jack-o'-Lantern Punch Recip
About: Mix up a whole bunch of this fall-flavored punch for your Halloween party.
HowToMake: In a mixing glass muddle the sugar cubes cloves and 1 ounce of the soda until the sugar dissolves. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a punch cup. Top with the remaining 2 ounces of club soda and garnish with apple slices cinnamon sticks and pumpkin seeds. (You can also multiply this recipe stir and strain into a punch bowl. Top each individual portion with club soda when serving).
Ingredients: Sugar cubes;Whole cloves;Club soda divided;Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Grand Reserve Rum;fresh-ground nutmeg;Lemon juice;Apple juice
Garnish: 1 Apple slices cinnamon sticks and pumpkin seeds

Name: Bloody Tini
About: A cocktail you can really sink your teeth into.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Top with Champagne and garnish with a fresh lime wedge.
Ingredients: VeeV Açaí Spirit;Açai juice;Fresh lime juice;Champagne

Name: Whiskey Cocktails We Love: The Safe Kicke
About: Created by a team of four top San Francisco bartenders this drink won a Gentleman Jack cocktail competition.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and shake without ice. Fill with ice shake again and double-strain into an Old Fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange peel and 3 cherries skewered.
Ingredients: Apricot preserves;Fresh lemon juice;Cara cara orange juice;Dry oloroso sherry;Fee Brothers whiskey-barrel-aged bitters;Egg white

Name: Cocoa Loco
About: All the chocolate and rum craziness you can handle.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the whipped cream to a small saucepan and simmer over low to medium heat until hot. Strain into a mug and top with whipped cream. Garnish with grated pistachio.
Ingredients: Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Rum;Godiva Chocolate Liqueur;Habanero chile pepper;Cinnamon;Brown sugar;Milk;Whipped cream

Name: Horni Toddy
About: Rich añejo tequila stands in for whiskey in this hot classic.
HowToMake: Coat the bottom of a mug with honey and add the tequila and lemon juice. Stir in the hot tea. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and lemon wheel.
Ingredients: honey;Hornitos Añejo Tequila;Lemon juice;Hot black tea

Name: Irish Blonde
About: St Patrick’s Day is around the corner. Start preparing now.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a flamed orange peel.
Ingredients: Michael Collins Blended Irish Whiskey;Orange curaçao;La Ina Fino Sherry;Regans' Orange Bitters

Name: Pumpkin & Spic
About: A clever oatmeal-infused vodka is why this fall drink is truly unique.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the ginger beer to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously for 25 seconds and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the ginger beer and garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
Ingredients: Pumpkin puree;Oloroso sherry;St. Elizabeth allspice dram;Molasses;Fee Brothers Black Walnut Bitters;Ginger beer

Name: Negroni Sbagliato
About: Though its name means incorrect Negroni this bubbly punch is the right drink for your next party.
HowToMake: Add the vermouth and liqueur to a punch bowl and add large ice cubes or a large ice block. Add the fruit and top with the prosecco. Stir gently and garnish with freshly grated cinnamon.
Ingredients: Sweet vermouth;Campari liqueur;Assorted seasonal fruit;Prosecco

Name: Finlandia Vodka Midnight Sun Martini
About: This cocktail will ensure that the sun never sets on your evening.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Ingredients: Finlandia Vodka;Triple sec;White (or red) Cranberry juice

Name: Pear & Cranberry Fizz
About: This concoction will give your fall a fruity and spirited boost.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the lemon juice and cranberries. Add the remaining ingredients except the club soda and fill with ice. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds and pour (unstrained) into a highball glass. Add additional ice to fill the glass if needed and top with club soda. Garnish with pear slices and fresh cranberries.
Ingredients: Fresh lemon juice;Fresh cranberries;Rothman & Winter Orchard Pear Liqueur;Cranberry juice;Fee Brothers cranberry bitters;Club soda

Name: Eden's Apple
About: Homemade apple-cinnamon vodka makes this sweet concoction a perfect autumn elixir.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds  and double-strain into a frozen coupe glass. Garnish with an apple slice. (This drink may also be served warm: Combine all the ingredients in a small saucepan over medium heat and stir until warm then strain into the coupe glass and garnish.).
Ingredients: John D. Taylor's Velvet Falernum;Lemon juice;Apple cider;Bar Keep Baked Apple Bitters

Name: Beachbum’s Ow
About: The Tiki mug is optional but come on you know you want one.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with crushed ice. Shake and pour (unstrained) into a Tiki mug or a double Old Fashioned glass.
Ingredients: Licor 43;Unsweetened pineapple juice;Orange juice;Fresh lemon juice;Passion fruit puree;Demerara rum (El Dorado or Lemon Hart);Light Virgin Islands rum (Cruzan)

Name: South Side
About: Despite its name there are no geographical limitations for this gin cocktail.
HowToMake: In a shaker gently muddle the mint and lemon juice. Add remaining ingredients and ice and shake. Strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.
Ingredients: Gin;Fresh lemon juice;Mint leaves;Simple syrup

Name: Autumn Wassail
About: A glass of this spiced-apple-cider-and-cognac concoction is just the thing for a chilly or warm afternoon.
HowToMake: To serve hot add the cognac and rum to a Toddy glass and top with the wassail. Garnish with apple slices or fresh cranberries. To serve cold add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Ingredients: Louis Royer Force 53° VSOP cognac;Santa Teresa 1796 Rum;Wassail hot (or 3 oz wassail chilled if serving cold)

Name: Zacapa Hot Toddy
About: If you’re feeling under-the-weather this toasty beverage will perk you right up.
HowToMake: Pour the water into a footed Irish coffee mug. Add the remaining ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake well pour into the mug and stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.
Ingredients: Boiling water;Zacapa 23 Rum;Clover honey;Fresh lemon juice

Name: Midnight Prayer
About: Giving thanks has never been easier.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir for thirty seconds and strain into a chilled small cocktail glass. Garnish with a broad slice of lemon peel.
Ingredients: G'Vine Floraison Gin;St-Germain Liqueur;Crème de violette;Regans\\\' Orange Bitters No. 6

Name: (ri)1 Clove & Oak
About: A perfect autumn cocktail with rye whiskey and apple cider.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously for at least 6 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with apple slices.
Ingredients: (ri)1 Whiskey;Allspice dram;Fresh lemon juice;Cloudy apple cider;Simple syrup

Name: Mint Muse
About: Get inspired by absinthe mint and pineapple juice.
HowToMake: Muddle the mint leaves with the lime wedge in a shaker. Add the Lucid Absinthe pineapple juice and fill with ice. Shake briefly and strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Top with Sprite or 7-Up and garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge.
Ingredients: Lucid absinthe;Pineapple juice;Mint leaves;Lime wedge;Sprite or 7UP
Garnish: 1 Mint sprig and a lime wedge

Name: The Flanders
About: Hi-diddly-ho whisky-rino!
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Ingredients: Canadian Club Whisky;Sweet vermouth;Bitters

Name: Mexican Punch
About: The perfect punch to put any fiesta into gear.
HowToMake: In a large pitcher muddle the limes lemons and orange. Add the tequila simple syrup lime juice grenadine and bitters. Stir well and add ice. Top with the 7Up and stir gently. Pour (unstrained) into 6 wine glasses and garnish each with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Limes quartered;Lemons quartered;Orange quartered;Blanco tequila;Simple syrup (one part sugar one part water);Fresh lime juice;Grenadine;Aromatic bitters;7UP

Name: Stoli Gala Applik Sangria
About: Sweet-and-tart apple vodka is a great addition to the classic.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a pitcher and fill with ice (For extra flavor muddle the fruit before adding the remaining ingredients).  Stir and pour into a tall glass filled with fresh ice.
Ingredients: Sliced citrus strawberries and apples;Stoli Gala Applik Vodka;White wine;White cranberry juice

Name: Hendrick's Breakfast Martini
About: The most important meal of the day just got a whole lot more fun.
HowToMake: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel and serve with buttered toast on the side.
Ingredients: Hendrick's Gin;Orange marmalade;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup

Name: Espresso Martini
About: What do you get when you mix tequila and espresso? One hell of a cocktail.
HowToMake: Coat the rim of a cocktail glass with sugar. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with powdered chocolate.
Ingredients: Sugar;Patrón Silver Tequila;Patrón XO Café Liqueur;Brewed espresso

Name: Apples & Pears
About: This autumnal vodka cocktail contains both.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients except the cider into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a double Old Fashioned glass over fresh ice. Top with the cider. Garnish with an apple slice and a sprinkle of grated nutmeg. *Vanilla-nutmeg syrup: Combine 2 cups sugar 2 tsp ground nutmeg 6 vanilla beans (cut in half lengthwise) and 2 cups water in a small saucepan and cook over low heat stirring until sugar is fully dissolved. Let syrup cool completely and strain into a closed container. Store in refrigerator.
Ingredients: Stolichnaya Gala Applik vodka;Pear juice;Vanilla-nutmeg syrup;Fresh lime juice;Angostura bitters;Hard cider

Name: Mojito Italiano
About: Celebrate the red white and green with a little Campari lemon and rum.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the mint syrup and lemon juice. Add the Campari and rum and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with prosecco and garnish with a mint sprig.
Ingredients: sprigs Fresh mint;Simple syrup;Fresh lemon juice;Campari;Flor de Caña Rum;Prosecco

Name: Maker's Mark Mojito
About: Try this Kentucky take on the Cuban classic.
HowToMake: Coat the rim of a tall glass with sugar and set aside. In a mixing glass muddle the simple syrup and mint. Squeeze in the juice from the lime wedges and add the bourbon and triple sec. Fill with ice and stir. Pour (unstrained) into the prepared glass and top with the soda. Garnish with an additional lime wedge.
Ingredients: Sugar;Simple syrup;Fresh mint;Lime wedges;Maker's Mark Bourbon;Triple sec;Club soda

Name: Fashionable Manhattan
About: This delicious bourbon cocktail is what happens when a Manhattan and an Old Fashioned hang out together.
HowToMake: In a cocktail glass lightly muddle the bitters lime lemon and orange. Remove the fruit remnants and discard. Add the bourbon and vermouth to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into the prepared glass. Run a bar spoon around the inside of the glass to incorporate the bitters and fruit oils. Garnish with a lightly crushed maraschino cherry.
Ingredients: Angostura bitters;Lime wedge;Lemon wedge;Orange wedge;Makers Mark Bourbon;Sweet vermouth

Name: Summer's End
About: Combine summer and autumn flavors in this simple drink you can make any time of year.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.
Ingredients: Applejack;Cherry liqueur

Name: Northern Spy
About: Go undercover with this top-secret applejack cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a small cocktail glass or coupe. Top with cava or sparkling white wine.
Ingredients: Applejack;Fresh apple cider;Fresh lemon juice;Apricot liqueur (Rothman & Winter);Cava or sparkling white wine

Name: Smuggler's Cove Straits Sling
About: You don’t need a pegleg a parrot or a tri-cornered hat to enjoy this drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the club soda and garnish with a lemon slice.
Ingredients: Bénédictine;Cherry Heering;Plymouth gin;Lemon juice;Demerara syrup (one part demerara sugar one part water);Orange bitters;Angostura bitters;Club soda

Name: Hudson Highland Cup
About: With apple butter maple syrup and hard cider this cocktail is like fall in a cup.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the hard cider to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with hard cider and garnish with an apple slice.
Ingredients: Highland Park 12-Year-Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky;Apple butter;Fresh lemon juice;Grade A maple syrup;Pastis;Hard cider

Name: Roosevelt
About: Channel the original Rough Rider with this rum cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Dark rum;Dry vermouth;Fresh orange juice;Sugar

Name: Don Julio Hot Nantucket Night
About: Heat things up with this spicy tequila tipple.
HowToMake: In a highball glass muddle the cranberries and jalapeño slice. Fill with ice and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a jalapeño pepper.
Ingredients: Fresh cranberries;Jalapeño pepper;Don Julio blanco tequila;Agave nectar;Lime juice

Name: Mata Hari
About: You’ll think completely differently about chai after tasting it in this cognac-based cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with 3 dried organic rosebuds. *EO chai-infused sweet vermouth: Add 4 green cardamom pods 4 cloves 1 cinnamon stick and 1 piece (1/2 inch) of ginger to a small saucepan and cook over medium heat for 2 minutes. Add 1 tbsp chai or black tea and 2 cups Cinzano rosso vermouth. Bring to a low boil and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and allow to cool completely. Add the remaining vermouth and strain the mixture through cheesecloth. Bottle and store at room temperature.
Ingredients: Louis Royer Force 53° VSOP cognac;EO-chai-infused sweet vermouth;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup;Pomegranate juice

Name: Bourbon Manhattan
About: You don’t need to be in the five boroughs to enjoy this sophisticated tipple.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry. (If you prefer a dry Manhattan use dry vermouth instead of sweet and garnish with a lemon twist.).
Ingredients: Bourbon;Italian sweet vermouth;Angostura bitters

Name: Lincoln Club Cooler
About: After a few sips you’ll be begging to join.
HowToMake: Add the rum and ginger ale to a highball glass filled with ice.
Ingredients: Cruzan Rum;Ginger ale

Name: Red Re
About: Neil Diamond would surely approve of this gin grape and mint cocktail.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the grapes. Add the remaining ingredients except the club soda and fill with ice. Shake well and double strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda and garnish with a mint leaf and a grape cluster.
Ingredients: Bulldog GIn;Fresh Concord grapes;Mint leaves;Fresh ginger;Lemon wedges;Raw sugar;Club soda
Garnish: 1 Mint leaf and a grape cluster

Name: Manhattan
About: Every home bartender should know how to make one of these.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until exceedingly well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Bourbon;Carpano Antica Formula vermouth;Fee Brothers whiskey-barrel-aged bitters

Name: Fat Like Buddha
About: The perfect companion on the road to enlightenment.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a coupe or rocks glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Dubonnet Rouge;Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Grand Reserve Rum;Bénédictine;Cointreau

Name: Smoky Paloma
About: This sweet-and-citrusy cocktail calls for not one but three different types of spirits.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and shake without ice for 10 seconds. Fill with ice and shake for another 10 seconds. Strain into a bucket glass filled with fresh ice and garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Tres Agaves Blanco Tequila;Del Maguey Vida Mezcal;Charbay Ruby Red Grapefruit Vodka;Agave nectar;Lime juice;Grapefruit juice;Egg white

Name: Chambord Mimosa
About: Toast the morning with this cocktail.
HowToMake: Add the Chambord and orange juice to a flute. Top with Champagne and garnish with fresh raspberries if desired.
Ingredients: Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur;Fresh orange juice;Champagne

Name: La Fleur de Paradis
About: Mix up this gin citrus juice St-Germain elderflower liqueur and Champagne cocktail for a taste of paradise.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the Champagne and garnish with an edible pansy if desired.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;Fresh lemon juice;Fresh grapefruit juice;St-Germain elderflower liqueur;Simple syrup;Orange bitters;Brut Champagne (Perrier-Jouët)

Name: Ketel One Vodka Martini
About: Face it: The Mad Men crew is cooler than you are. Take a step in the right direction with this classic. If you favor a vodka-based Martini why not fill yours with a spirit boasting a rich centuries-old legacy? The Nolet family has been distilling spirits in the Netherlands since 1691 which means Ketel One is the ideal partner for dry vermouth in a classic Vodka Martini.
HowToMake: Add both ingredients to a Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.
Ingredients: Ketel One Vodka;Dry vermouth

Name: French 75
About: This bubbly gin and lemon cocktail will have you saying “oui.”
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a flute. Top with Champagne and garnish with Maraschino cherries.
Ingredients: Beefeater gin;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup;Champagne

Name: Sunset Gold
About: The cocktail is Sweden’s gift to you.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a rocks glass fill with crushed ice and stir. Garnish with a mint sprig.
Ingredients: Fresh lemon juice;Mint syrup (simple syrup flavored with torn mint leaves);Club soda

Name: Cardamom & Pop Punch
About: Spice up your night with this complex cocktail.
HowToMake: In a shaker dissolve the sugar cubes in 1 ounce of the club soda. Add the cardamom and muddle. Add the rum lime juice grapefruit juice and bitters one at a time while stirring. Fill with ice and stir. Strain into a cocktail or punch glass and top with the remaining 2 ounces of club soda. Garnish with lime wheels.
Ingredients: Sugar cubes;Club soda divided;Green cardamom pods;Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Grand Reserve Rum;Lime juice;Grapefruit juice;Regans Orange Bitters No. 6

Name: Hanky Panky
About: Try this sultry cocktail invented at London’s Savoy hotel.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Gin;Sweet vermouth;Fernet-Branca

Name: Stoli Bloody Mary
About: You decide exactly how to season this brunch-time classic.
HowToMake: Add the vodka tomato juice lemon juice and horseradish to a Collins glass filled with ice. Add Worcestershire sauce hot sauce salt and pepper to taste. Stir gently and garnish with celery and olives.
Ingredients: Stoli 80 Vodka;Tomato juice;Fresh lemon juice;Freshly grated horseradish;Worcestershire sauce;Hot sauce;Salt;Freshly ground pepper

Name: Side by Sidecar
About: Try this pomegranate variation on the classic.
HowToMake: Moisten the rim of a chilled Martini glass and coat it with sugar. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into the prepared glass.
Ingredients: Sugar;Pama Pomegranate liqueur;Cognac;Triple sec;Fresh lemon juice

Name: Bowery Orchar
About: With apple juice and Tennessee whiskey this orchard is one you’ll want to visit over and over.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an apple slice.
Ingredients: Gentleman Jack Tennessee Whiskey;Elderflower cordial;Simple syrup;Apple juice;Lemon juice;Bitters

Name: Bulleit Sazerac
About: Sambuca instead of the traditional absinthe makes this an Italian twist on the New Orleans favorite.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a rocks glass.
Ingredients: Stirrings Blood Orange Bitters;Bulleit Rye Whiskey;Romana Sambuca

Name: VeeV Eco Mojito
About: Make the Cuban classic with a carbon-neutral spirit.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the lime and mint. Add the VeeV and fill with ice. Shake well and pour (unstrained) into an Old Fashioned glass. Top with club soda and garnish with a mint sprig.
Ingredients: Lime wedges;Mint leaves;VeeV Açaí Spirit;Club soda

Name: Start Me Up!
About: Nothing like a little gin to rev your engine.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients except the ginger ale into a shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a highball glass over fresh ice. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with a lemon wedge.
Ingredients: Bulldog gIn;Apple cider;Ginger liqueur;Pomegranate juice;Ginger ale

Name: Barbados Rum Punc
About: An island paradise right in your glass.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a pinch of freshly grated nutmeg and a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Fresh lime juice;Rich simple syrup (2 parts sugar 1 part water);Aged Barbados rum (such as Mount Gay);Angostura bitters

Name: Spiced Chocolate
About: Red peppers. Chocolate liqueur. Tequila. Your tongue will dance.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the whipped cream to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled old fashioned glass. Layer the top of the cocktail with a dollop of whipped cream and garnish with a large pinch of crushed red pepper.
Ingredients: Patrón XO Café Liqueur;Patrón Reposado Tequila;Dark chocolate liqueur;Fresh whipped cream

Name: Perfect Storm
About: Try this orange-liqueur spin on the classic Dark & Stormy.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the ginger beer to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the ginger beer and swirl. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Grand Marnier;Fresh lime juice;Angostura bitters;Ginger beer

Name: 24 Martini
About: Try Dan Warner’s simple but elegant Beefeater 24 Gin Martini.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.
Ingredients: Beefeater 24 Gin;Lillet Blanc;Regans' Orange Bitters No .6

Name: Deshler
About: Enjoy your favorite rye whiskey in this Dubonnet and Cointreau drink from Brian Miller.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Rye Whiskey;Dubonnet Rouge;Cointreau;Peychaud\\\'s Bitters

Name: Cable Car
About: Try this modern San Francisco classic.
HowToMake: Stir together the cinnamon and sugar in a wide-mouthed bowl or on a saucer. Rub the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with the lemon wedge and dip in the cinnamon-sugar mixture to coat. Set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into the prepared glass and garnish with an orange spiral.
Ingredients: Ground cinnamon;Sugar;Lemon wedge;Spiced rum;Marie Brizard Orange Curaçao;Simple syrup (one part sugar one part water);Lemon juice

Name: Harvey Wallbanger
About: The Harvey Wallbanger is a modern classic that combines a Screwdriver with the Italian liqueur Galliano. Reportedly born in the 50s the cocktail was a hit in the 1970s. Recently Galliano converted back to their original recipe so try this drink today if you want to relive the golden days of disco.
HowToMake: Add the vodka and orange juice into a tall glass over ice and stir. Float the Galliano on top. Garnish with a skewered orange slice and maraschino cherry.
Ingredients: Vodka;Orange juice;Galliano L'Autentico liqueur

Name: Everest
About: Next time you say you’ve conquered Everest you technically won’t be lying.
HowToMake: Stir together the cream of coconut and curry powder to make a paste. Add the paste and the remaining ingredients to a shaker. Fill with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a sprinkle of additional curry powder.
Ingredients: Coco Lopez cream of coconut;Curry powder;Beefeater 24 Gin;Lemon juice

Name: Cherry Bomb
About: This easy fruity and bubbly cocktail will blow you away. It combines the Brazilian sugarcane liquor cachaça with a sweet and tart cherry liqueur. Try the recipe for the Cherry Bomb below.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda and garnish with a lime wheel and a cherry.
Ingredients: Cachaça;Cherry liqueur;Fresh lime juice;Club soda

Name: Sans-Culottes
About: This fresh summery punch could have cooled the flames of the French Revolution.
HowToMake: In a punch bowl crush the blueberries and a splash of simple syrup. Add the remaining ingredients except the pomegranate soda plus plenty of ice. Stir well and top gently with the pomegranate soda. Garnish with lemon and lime wheels.
Ingredients: Fresh blueberries;Simple syrup;Pernod absinthe;Elderflower liqueur;Fresh lime juice;Coconut water;Pomegranate soda

Name: Campari Sparkling Passion
About: Start celebrating the holidays early with this prosecco cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into an ice-cold flute. Garnish with raspberries orange and fresh mint on a toothpick.
Ingredients: Campari;Prosecco;Grapefruit juice;Passion fruit puree

Name: Campari Açaí Brunch Punc
About: Get your morning off to the right start with this drink from Ted Allen.
HowToMake: The night before serving stir together 8 ounces each of the tangerine and cranberry juices and divide between 2 small uncovered food-storage containers. Place 3 basil sprigs in each container and freeze overnight. Pop the frozen juices out of their containers and place in a half-gallon pitcher. Add the remaining 8 ounces each of tangerine and cranberry juices along with the açai juice rum or vodka and Campari. (If you can't find açaí juice substitute extra cranberry or tangerine juice.) Stir and garnish with lime orange and lemon wheels. Serve in tall glasses filled with ice.
Ingredients: Tangerine juice or orange juice (no pulp);Cranberry juice (100% juice) divided;Basil or mint;Açai juice;White rum or vodka cold;Campari

Name: Pama Party Punch
About: This tart fruity and fizzy recipe makes about a gallon of punch.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the ginger ale to a bowl or pitcher and refrigerate until cold. Pour the mixture into a large punch bowl and fill with ice. Gently stir in the ginger ale and garnish with orange lemon and lime slices.
Ingredients: Pama Pomegranate liqueur;Banks 5 Island Rum;Orange juice;Lemon juice;Cranberry juice;Ginger ale chilled

Name: Knob Creek Old Fashioned
About: This potent bourbon cocktail is surprisingly sweet.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon peel.
Ingredients: Knob Creek Bourbon;Rich simple syrup (two parts sugar one part water);Fee Brothers Old Fashion Bitters

Name: Montford Spritz
About: This gin-and-Champagne cocktail is the perfect aperitif.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a wine glass and fill with ice. Stir until cold. Top with Champagne and garnish with a grapefruit twist.
Ingredients: Beefeater 24 Gin;Cynar;Lillet Blanc;Aperol;Peychaud's Bitters;Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut Champagne

Name: Firecracker
About: Start your celebration with this spicy cocktail.
HowToMake: In a mixing glass muddle the watermelon. Add remaining ingredients and ice and stir. Pour (unstrained) into a cocktail or Margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Watermelon chunks;Flor de Caña Grand Reserve seven-year-old rum;Triple sec;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup;Cayenne pepper

Name: Greenpoint
About: As hip as the Brooklyn neighborhood for which it’s named. The Greenpoint is variation on the Brooklyn which was spawned from a classic Manhattan. Created at NYC’s legendary Milk & Honey it was named after the Greenpoint neighborhood of Brooklyn and the greenish hue of the Chartreuse used to make it.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a couple or cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.
Ingredients: Rye whiskey;Green Chartreuse;Sweet vermouth;Angostura bitters;Orange bitters

Name: Midnight Martine
About: You can mix up this simple-but-sophisticated drink at any time of night.
HowToMake: Add the vodka and vermouth to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a Martini glass. Squeeze the orange peel over the drink and discard. Garnish with a cherry.
Ingredients: Grey Goose Cherry Noir Flavored Vodka;Noilly Prat Rouge Vermouth (or other sweet vermouth);Orange peel

Name: Mary Pickford
About: Sweet but with a real kick just like its namesake.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Ingredients: White rum;Pineapple juice;Grenadine;Maraschino liqueur

Name: VeeV Marguerite
About: As sweet as she is tart.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake until a frost forms and strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge.
Ingredients: VeeV Açaí Spirit;Lemon;an orange;Raspberry syrup or maraschino liqueur or grenadine

Name: Jalisco Express
About: Climb aboard a tequila and espresso delight.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass. Float an espresso-roast coffee bean on top of the drink.
Ingredients: Don Julio blanco tequila;Coffee liqueur;Agave syrup (one part agave nectar one part water)

Name: Bellin
About: This sparkling classic got its start at Venice’s famed Harry’s Bar.
HowToMake: Add the peach purée to a Champagne flute. Fill with the prosecco. Garnish with a peach slice.
Ingredients: Fresh white peach purée;Prosecco chilled

Name: Summerlin
About: Watermelon juice should be a more common part of your summer cocktails. Start here.
HowToMake: Place one large ice cube into an old fashioned glass and add all the ingredients. Stir well and garnish with a pinch of cracked black pepper and a small edible orchid.
Ingredients: Zacapa 23 Rum;Fresh lemon juice;Fresh watermelon juice;Simple syrup

Name: Wild Turkey Sparkling Tea
About: An ideal summer punch for your next backyard barbecue.
HowToMake: In a large saucepan boil 2 cups of the water. Remove from the heat and add the tea bags. Steep for 10 minutes and then discard the tea bags. Add the remaining 2 cups of water. Stir in the Wild Turkey American Honey transfer to a pitcher and chill. Just before serving add the lemon juice and club soda. Pour the drink into tall glasses filled with ice. Garnish each glass with a couple cherries.
Ingredients: Water;Red herbal tea bags (lemon zinger or hibiscus);Wild Turkey American Honey;Club soda;Juice of 1 lemon

Name: Cherry Collin
About: The classic Collins gets a black-cherry makeover.
HowToMake: Add the vodka lemon juice and simple syrup to a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with club soda and garnish with a cherry.
Ingredients: Grey Goose Cherry Noir Flavored Vodka;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup;Club soda

Name: Snap Crackle Drop
About: The classic tequila shot gets a master mixologist’s upgrade.
HowToMake: Pour the tequila into a shot glass. Stir together the bitters and pepper on a saucer until they form a paste and coat one side of the lime wedge with the mixture. Take a bite of the lime and then sip the spirit.
Ingredients: Don Julio Reposado Tequila;Angostura bitters;Freshly ground black pepper;Lime wedge

Name: Bulleit Perfect Manhattan
About: It’s the combo of sweet and dry vermouths that makes this classic perfect. Bulleit’s unorthodox twist on the old-school Manhattan? The use of both dry and sweet vermouth in addition to a dash of potent blood orange bitters in place of the usual Angostura. The result is a doubly aromatic complex take on the classic.
HowToMake: Add the rye and both vermouths to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the bitters and garnish with a Maraschino cherry.
Ingredients: Bulleit Rye Whiskey;Dry vermouth;Sweet vermouth;Stirrings Blood Orange Bitters

Name: Bloody Roma
About: Celebrity chef Chris Cosentino begins brunch with this spicy beer-based oyster-topped culinary concoction.
HowToMake: Place 2 olives in each of 6 pint glasses. Pour half a bottle of beer into each glass and top with the Roman Mix divided evenly among the glasses. Place 2 shucked oysters with their liquor in each glass and garnish with an additional olive a serrano chile and a few chile threads.
Ingredients: Castelvetrano or other mild green olives;Beer (preferably Anchor Steam) cold;Roman Mix;Oysters (preferably Kumamato or Kusshi) shucked liquor reserved

Name: Cuba Libre
About: It doesn’t get any simpler than a Rum & Coke with lime.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Rum

Name: Euro
About: Go on a Continental tour with Irish whiskey French vermouth and Spanish sherry.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of lemon peel.
Ingredients: Michael Collins Blended Irish Whiskey;Dry Dolin Vermouth de Chambéry;Amontillado sherry;Grand Marnier

Name: Sandeman Ciderhouse Sangria
About: Throw an autumn party with this port cider and rye concoction.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a pitcher and refrigerate for at least 12 hours. Serve in tumblers garnished with apple or pear slices.
Ingredients: Sandeman Founders Reserve Port;Apple cider;Rye Whiskey;Maple syrup;Granny Smith apples cored and sliced;Pears cored and sliced

Name: The Lone Range
About: Mix up this tequila-and-sparkling-wine sipper and relax on a sunny spring day.
HowToMake: Add the tequila lemon juice and simple syrup to a shaker. Fill with ice and shake. Open the shaker and add the sparkling wine then strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Silver tequila;Lemon juice;Rich simple syrup (two parts sugar one part water);Brut rosé sparkling wine

Name: 1792 Kentucky White Dog Jule
About: In honor of the state’s 220th anniversary Liquor.com advisory board member David Wondrich created this refreshing Bluegrass tipple.
HowToMake: Add the sugar and water to a highball glass and stir until the sugar has completely dissolved. Add the mint leaves and press lightly with a muddler. Pack the glass with finely cracked ice (wrap cubes in a towel and bash the bejeezus out of them with something hard and heavy) and then add the whiskey. Stir add more ice to make up for any shrinkage and garnish with two or three sprigs of mint and a straw.
Ingredients: Sugar;Water;Mint leaves;Unaged corn or rye whiskey

Name: Kirsch au Caf
About: Cherry brandy and espresso come together beautifully.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the espresso to a shaker and shake (without ice) until frothy. Fill with ice and add the espresso. Shake well and strain into two small cocktail glasses.
Ingredients: Cognac;Kirsch;Cherry Heering;Simple syrup;Egg white;Espresso

Name: ZaCava
About: It’s sparkly and sweet and packs a rum punch.
HowToMake: Add the rum sugar cube and bitters to a Champagne flute. Fill with Cava.
Ingredients: Zacapa 23 Rum;Sugar;Angostura bitters;Cava sparkling wine

Name: Cape Codder
About: Pretend like you’re on your yacht when you mix this one up.
HowToMake: Add the vodka into a highball glass over ice. Top with cranberry juice and stir until chilled. Squeeze a lime wedge over the glass and drop it into the drink.
Ingredients: Vodka;Cranberry juice to top;Lime wedge

Name: “Dirty Martini
About: It may look like one but this sweet concoction is anything but a Martini.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with an olive.
Ingredients: Hendrick\'s Gin;White grape juice;White balsamic vinegar;Simple syrup

Name: Spazerac
About: Try this unusual frozen spin on the classic Sazerac.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a blender with just under 1 cup of ice. Blend until smooth and pour into an Old Fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Rye whiskey;Simple syrup;Absinthe;Lemon juice;Peychaud's bitters

Name: The Maxwell
About: This refreshing Champagne cocktail is perfect for a date—the recipe makes a pair of drinks.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a large shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds and double-strain into two flutes. Top each with Champagne and chill the rest of the bottle in an ice bucket. While drinking top with more Champagne as needed.
Ingredients: Square One cucumber vodka;Cucumber juice;Cointreau;Lemon juice;Agave nectar;Brut Champagne or other sparkling wine (about 1 split bottle)

Name: Fish House Punc
About: The recipe for this classic Philadelphia tipple is at least 200 years old.
HowToMake: At least a day ahead fill a 2-quart bowl with water and freeze until completely solid. In a large punch bowl muddle the lemon peels and sugar. Let the mixture stand for at least 3 hours. Add the boiling water stirring until as much as possible of the sugar has dissolved. Add the remaining ingredients and stir to combine. To serve add the ice block and garnish liberally with freshly grated nutmeg. This recipe serves 25.
Ingredients: Lemons;Demerara sugar;Boiling water;Fresh lemon juice;Smith & Cross traditional Jamaica rum (or other strong Jamaican);V.S.O.P cognac;Peach brandy;Cold water (96 oz)

Name: Bacchanalian
About: New Orleans mixologist Chris Hannah makes this cognac-and-merlot concoction for Mardi Gras celebrations.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a wine glass filled with fresh ice.
Ingredients: Cognac;Merlot wine;Lemon juice;Agave nectar

Name: Bloody Caesar
About: This clam-juice-spiked Bloody Mary is the national cocktail of Canada.
HowToMake: Coat the rim of a tall glass with celery salt fill with ice and set aside. Add remaining ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Pour back and forth into another mixing glass a few times to mix. Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a cucumber spear lime wedge and parsley sprig.
Ingredients: Celery salt;Vodka;Clamato juice;Worcestershire sauce;Tabasco sauce;Prepared horseradish to taste (optional)

Name: Nueva Playa del Sur
About: This elegant bubbly rum cocktail is good for the beach or the ballroom.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a coupe or cocktail glass. Top with the Champagne and garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Brugal Añejo Rum;Blood orange puree;Agave nectar;Champagne

Name: Black Pepper Gibso
About: The black-pepper-and-onion garnish makes this classic drink a savory delight.
HowToMake: Rinse a Martini glass with vermouth and set aside. Add the vodka to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with cocktail onions and freshly cracked black pepper.
Ingredients: Dry vermouth;Karlssons Gold Vodka

Name: Swedish Mul
About: A unique potato vodka makes this version of the classic Moscow Mule distinctive.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a Collins glass filled with ice and stir to combine.
Ingredients: Ginger beer;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup

Name: Martha Washington Punch
About: Try the first First Lady’s famous rum-and-citrus drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a pitcher or other container and stir to combine. Refrigerate until cold. Place a large ice block into a punch bowl (or fill halfway with large ice cubes). Add the prepared mixture and the club soda and stir. Garnish with lemon and orange half-wheels and grated nutmeg.
Ingredients: Flor de Caña 4-Year-Old Gold Rum;Appleton Estate Extra 12-Year-Old Rum;Grand Marnier;Fresh lemon juice;Fresh orange juice;Spiced simple syrup;Club soda

Name: Jane Russell
About: This voluptuous rye-based cocktail packs a wallop.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a coupe or cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Russell's Reserve Rye;Rittenhouse Rye;Carpano Antica formula vermouth;Grand Marnier;Bénédictine;Bittermens Xocolatl Mole bitters

Name: Black Cherry Col
About: The soda fountain just grew up.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a rocks glass filled with ice. Stir briefly and garnish with a cherry.
Ingredients: Grey Goose Cherry Noir Flavored Vodka;Cola;Grenadine

Name: Old Fashioned
About: The Old Fashioned cocktail is old-school but never out of fashion.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass muddle to break down the sugar and stir briefly. Fill with ice and stir again. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Twist slices of lemon and orange peel over the drink to express the oil and drop them in.
Ingredients: Bourbon;White sugar;Angostura bitters;Regan's Orange Bitters No. 6;Cold water;Brown sugar cube

Name: Ricard (Traditional Serve
About: Enjoy the “milk of Marseille” the traditional French way.
HowToMake: Add the Ricard Pastis (and grenadine if desired) to a highball glass and pour in thewater. Fill with ice and stir.
Ingredients: Ricard Pastis;Grenadine;Cold water

Name: Becharit
About: Introduce yourself to the complex Czech herbal liqueur Becherovka with this sweet-and-sour delight.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highballglass filled with fresh ice.
Ingredients: Reposado tequila;Becherovka;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup;Peach nectar

Name: The Treasure Margarita
About: It doesn’t get much simpler than this easy take on the classic.
HowToMake: Rub the rim of a Margarita glass with the lime wedge and then dip in salt to coat. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Lime wedge;Coarse salt;El Tesoro Reposado Tequila;Orange liqueur;Homemade Margarita mix (three parts sugar one part water)

Name: Honey Berry Sling
About: This sweet-and-tart creation will set you abuzz.
HowToMake: Fill a highball glass with ice and squeeze the lime wedge into the glass. Add the vodka and liqueur and top with the cranberry juice. Stir and garnish with the squeezed lime wedge.
Ingredients: Lime wedge;42Below Honey Vodka;Chambord or other raspberry liqueur;Cranberry juice

Name: Tully-Tini
About: Irish whiskey is the backbone of this sweet-and-tart cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with an apple slice.
Ingredients: Tullamore D.E.W. Irish Whiskey;Sour apple liqueur;Cranberry juice

Name: Batida Rosa
About: This simple but delicious creation is packed with fruit flavor.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients except the club soda into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a wine glass over fresh ice. Top with the club soda. Garnish with an orange wheel.
Ingredients: Cachaça;Pineapple juice;Lemon juice;Grenadine;Club soda

Name: Sazera
About: Before it called for rye whiskey the New Orleans classic was made with cognac.
HowToMake: Rinse a chilled Old Fashioned glass with the absinthe fill with crushed ice and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass and strain the drink into it. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Absinthe;Cognac;Simple syrup;Peychaud's bitters

Name: Guava Rose
About: This blended drink goes exotic with cachaça guava and rose syrup.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a blender and blend for about 30 seconds. Serve in a coupe glass. Garnish with a rose petal.
Ingredients: Leblon cachaça;Guava puree;Rose syrup;Lime juice;Ice

Name: Pina Perfection
About: Pineapple tequila and rosemary collide in this fresh complex drink.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the rosemary. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh rosemary.
Ingredients: Fresh rosemary;Don Julio Añejo Tequila;Fresh lime juice;Fresh pineapple juice;Simple syrup

Name: Cherry Moo
About: This bubbly tipple will light up your night.
HowToMake: Fill a rocks glass with ice and add the vodka. Add the soda and top with the grenadine. Garnish with a cherry.
Ingredients: Grey Goose Cherry Noir Flavored Vodka;Lemon-lime soda;Grenadine

Name: Queen Elizabeth
About: This early post-Prohibition concoction from Philadelphia is named for its creator’s wife not the monarch.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Ingredients: Dry vermouth (Noilly Prat);Bénédictine;Fresh lime juice

Name: Green Beast
About: Make a big bowl of this refreshing absinthe and lime punch.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients to a Collins glass with ice. Garnish with 4 cucumber slices and stir. (This recipe can be multiplied to fill a large punch bowl.).
Ingredients: Pernod absinthe;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup;Water

Name: Yellow Bir
About: You don’t need to be Audubon to appreciate this tasty cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel or a slice of lime peel.
Ingredients: White rum;Galliano L'Autentico;Bols Triple Sec;Fresh lime juice

Name: Golden Cadilla
About: You’ll be king of the road when mix up this creamy classic.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings.
Ingredients: Galliano L'Autentico liqueur;Bols cacao white liqueur;Heavy cream

Name: Le Citron Caipirosk
About: Love citrus? Try this sweet-and-sour recipe.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the lime and simple syrup or sugar. Add the vodka and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and pour (unstrained) into a rocks glass. Top with a splash of club soda and add additional ice if needed.
Ingredients: Small lime cut into eighths;Simple syrup;Grey Goose Le Citron Flavored Vodka;Club soda

Name: L'Orange White Cosm
About: The enduring classic without the pink hue.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a slice of orange peel.
Ingredients: Orange liqueur;White cranberry juice;Lime

Name: La Poire Peartin
About: Pear vodka and Disaronno make an elegant treat.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a pear slice.
Ingredients: Grey Goose La Poire flavored vodka;Disaronno;Simple syrup;Lemon juice

Name: Grey Goose Classic Martin
About: Ignore James Bond’s famous instructions and stir this vodka-based Martini instead of shaking. As British author W. Somerset Maugham once stated “Martinis should always be stirred not shaken so that the molecules lie sensuously one on top of the other.” Wise words for gin and vodka Martinis alike.
HowToMake: Fill a mixing glass with ice and add the vermouth. Stir to coat the ice and strain discarding the excess vermouth. Add the vodka and bitters if desired and stir well. Strain into a chilled Martini glass and garnish with an olive or lemon twist.
Ingredients: Noilly Prat dry vermouth;Grey Goose Vodka;Orange bitters

Name: Fresh Berry Delicious
About: With muddled strawberries honey and a couple complex liqueurs this drink delivers on its name.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the strawberries. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake very well and double strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with half a strawberry.
Ingredients: Large strawberries;Lemon juice;Honey syrup (one part honey one part water);Solerno Blood Orange Liqueur;Licor 43;Stoli Razberi Vodka

Name: Margaritas by the Pitche
About: Make a roomful of people happy all at once.Add to your fiesta with this delicious enchilada recipe.
HowToMake: For this recipe you need a 52-ounce pitcher. In a 52-ounce pitcher add the lime juice then the Cointreau. Adjust the sweetness with a little agave syrup (2 parts agave nectar 1 part water) or simple syrup (1 part sugar 1 part water). Add the tequila and taste. The mixture should still be intense because you haven't added any ice yet. To serve pour 3 oz of the mixture into a shaker with ice and shake. Srain into a stemmed Margarita glass with a half-salted rim or a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a thin lime wheel. If you have a large shaker or a gallon jar with a screw-top you can shake a whole bunch of drinks at the same time.
Ingredients: Fresh lime juice;Cointreau;Agave syrup or simple syrup;Tequila

About: Featuring a delicious grapefruit-lavender cordial this drink highlights gin’s floral character.
HowToMake: Mist a frozen cocktail glass with pastis and set aside. Add the gin Grapefruit-Lavender Cordial Lillet and bitters to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into the prepared glass. Twist the lemon peel over the drink to extract its oils and discard. Garnish with a swatch of lemon peel and a lavender sprig on a cocktail pick.
Ingredients: Pastis;Plymouth gin;Grapefruit-Lavender Cordial;Lillet Rose;Bar Code Lavender Spice Bitters;Lemon peel

Name: Cherry Lan
About: This fruity cocktail is sweet sour and complex.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with cherries on a cocktail pick.
Ingredients: Grey Goose Cherry Noir Flavored Vodka;Bénédictine;Lemon juice;Simple syrup;Bitters

Name: Dutch Negroni
About: Dutch genever makes an intriguing version of this classic Italian aperitif.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a large piece of orange zest or an orange half-wheel.
Ingredients: Bols genever;Campari;Sweet vermouth

Name: Hearts of Pom
About: Sweet-and-tart pomegranate is the ideal addition to this Margarita variation.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a coupe or cocktail glass. Garnish with a few pomegranate arils if desired.
Ingredients: Riazul Silver Tequila;Pomegranate juice;Cointreau;Fresh lime juice

Name: Comanche Clu
About: What do you get when you combine a Negroni and a Last Word? This unexpectedly delicious concoction.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and fine strain into a coupe glass. Twist a slice of orange peel over the drink to express its oils and discard.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;Campari;Cinzano Rosso vermouth;Yellow Chartreuse;Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur;Lime juice

Name: Oceanus Cocktai
About: Swap the vermouth in a Martini for sherry and you’ll get this simple but delicious drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a cocktail or rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and an olive or other pickled vegetable.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;La Gitana Manzanilla Sherry;The Bitter Truth Celery Bitters
Garnish: 1 Lemon twist and olive or other pickled vegetable

Name: The Pale Ride
About: A unique combination of gin vermouth sherry absinthe and a French thyme liqueur.
HowToMake: Rinse a small coupe glass with absinthe and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir for 30 seconds and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon peel.
Ingredients: St. George Absinthe Verte;Plymouth gin;Fino sherry;Dolin blanc vermouth;Angostura bitters;Orange bitters;Farigoule thyme liqueur

Name: The Foghorn Cocktai
About: This gin drink will help guide your night.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;Cointreau;Cocchi Americano;Absinthe

Name: 75 & Sunn
About: Created by a star Los Angeles bartender this unusual cocktail will transport you to Southern California.
HowToMake: Coat the tarragon sprigs in Chartreuse and heat carefully over an open flame for about 15 seconds each. Set one �"smoked�" tarragon sprig aside and muddle the second in a shaker with the Honeydew Honey Syrup. Add the gin lemon juice bitters and 2 tsp. Yellow Chartreuse and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and fine-strain into a fluted pilsner glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with the reserved �"smoked�" tarragon sprig.
Ingredients: Fresh tarragon;Yellow Chartreuse;Honeydew Honey Syrup;Plymouth gin;Lemon juice;Dr. Adam Elmegirab's Dandelion & Burdock Bitters;Club soda

Name: Medicinal Courag
About: It’ll cure what ails you.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the gin lemon juice and rosemary. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake and fine-strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a sprig of rosemary.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;Fresh lemon juice;Fresh rosemary;Amaro Nonino;Star Anise-Infused Honey Syrup;Angostura bitters;Dr. Adam Elmegirab\'s Aphrodite Bitters

Name: Plymouth Harvest Margherit
About: Try this gin-based Italian-flavored concoction at your next brunch.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the tomatoes and basil. Add the remaining ingredients except the club soda and fill with ice. Shake and double-strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the club soda and garnish with a basil leaf wrapped around a grape tomato on a cocktail pick.
Ingredients: Grape tomatoes;Large basil leaf;Plymouth gin;Basil-Peppercorn Syrup;Fresh lemon juice;Balsamic vinegar;Club soda

Name: The Cappa
About: Try this drink named for the black cloaks worn by Dominican friars.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a small wine or cocktail glass. Twist a slice of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;Pierre Ferrand Pineau des Charentes Selection;Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur

Name: Speedwell Cooler
About: Get refreshed with this complex gin-based tipple.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a strip of cucumber peel.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;Aperol;Watermelon juice;Lemon juice;Simple syrup;Absinthe;Salt

Name: Plymouth Duf
About: This drink proves that gin and beer play well together.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the pale ale to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the pale ale and garnish with a long strip of lemon peel and a cinnamon stick.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;Sweet dessert wine;Lemon juice;Ground cinnamon;Angostura bitters;English-style pale ale
Garnish: 1 Long strip of lemon peel and cinnamon stick

Name: Tender Nob
About: Cognac rye a couple complex liqueurs and walnut orgeat combine in this extravagant cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a rocks glass containing one large ice cube. Garnish with an orange twist and a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Hennessy Cognac;Wild Turkey Rye Whiskey;Liquore Strega;Luxardo Amaro Abano;Walnut orgeat

Name: Prince’s Pimm
About: Address this Champagne cocktail as “Your Highness.”
HowToMake: Add the Pimms to a highball glass filled with ice and top with Champagne. Garnish with cucumber slices and a mint sprig.
Ingredients: Pimm\'s No.1;Champagne

Name: Black Demure
About: With a slug of spicy bourbon this blackberry cocktail isn’t as demure as she looks.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into an Old Fashioned glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a blackberry and orange wheel.
Ingredients: Wild Turkey 81 Proof bourbon;Massenez crème de mure;Cointreau;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup

Name: Space Gin Smash
About: Famed British bartender Angus Winchester likes to mix up this fruity tipple on rainy days.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the mint lemon grapes apple and simple syrup. Add the gin and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh cracked ice. Garnish with an apple fan a mint sprig and a grape.
Ingredients: Mint leaves;Lemon;Seedless green grapes;Green apple;Simple syrup;Tanqueray gin
Garnish: 1 Apple fan mint sprig and grape

Name: Scarlet Glow
About: The secret to this gorgeous tipple is chilled hibiscus tea.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.
Ingredients: Pisco;Yellow Chartreuse;Fresh grapefruit juice;Hibiscus tea syrup

Name: Sangrita Recip
About: This savory concoction is the classic accompaniment to a shot of good tequila.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a pitcher and stir until salt dissolves. Let stand for 15 to 30 minutes then remove and discard the jalapeño. (The longer the jalapeño infuses the spicier the Sangrita will be.). Serve as accompaniment to shot of tequila. Store in refrigerator.
Ingredients: Lime juice;Orange juice;Grapefruit juice;Salt;Freshly ground black pepper;Tomato juice;Tabasco;Jalapeño pepper halved (with seeds)

Name: Lights Out Punch
About: With tea-infused vermouth and tequila this fizzy concoction is a cocktail-party champion.
HowToMake: At least 24 hours prior to kickoff fill a plastic container (1-pint or 1-quart depending on the size of your punch bowl) with water and add apple slices and cinnamon sticks if desired. Freeze until solid. Combine the tea and vermouth in a jar or other container and let stand for 90 minutes. Strain and refrigerate. On game day combine the tea-infused vermouth and the remaining ingredients in a punch bowl adding the soda last. Carefully add the prepared ice block and garnish lavishly with apple slices and freshly grated cinnamon and nutmeg.
Ingredients: Apple slices (optional);Cinnamon sticks (optional);MarketSpice cinnamon-orange black tea (or other spiced black tea);Sweet vermouth;750 mL Centinela reposado tequila (or other reposado tequila) chilled;Fresh apple juice or cider chilled;Fresh lemon juice;Demerara syrup (2 parts Demerara sugar 1 part water) chilled;Angostura bitters;Fee Brothers Old Fashioned bitters or The Bitter Truth Old Time aromatic bitters;Club soda chilled

Name: Partida Palom
About: You need authentic Mexican grapefruit soda to make an authentic version of the tequila classic.
HowToMake: Fill a highball glass with ice and add the tequila and salt. Squeeze the lime half into the glass and drop into the drink. Fill with grapefruit soda.
Ingredients: Partida blanco tequila;Salt;Half a lime;Grapefruit soda

Name: Tequila Cocktails We Love: La Perl
About: This sophisticated sherry-and-tequila cocktail proves that the agave spirit can be elegant.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Partida reposado tequila;Domecq manzanilla sherry;Mathilde pear liqueur

Name: Cucumber & Rose Collins
About: The classic Collins took a trip through the garden.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a cucumber slice.
Ingredients: Hendrick's Gin;Fresh lemon juice;Rose syrup;Fresh cucumber water

Name: Malen
About: Rye whiskey Campari and sweet port join forces in this delicious sipper.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir briefly and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice or a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange half-wheel and a dusting of ground cinnamon.
Ingredients: Wild Turkey Rye Whiskey;Campari;Graham's Six Grapes Port;Orange blossom water;Regans' Orange Bitters

Name: Boston Rum Punch
About: This delicious mix of rum and lemonade is a Beantown classic.
HowToMake: Add the rum into a shaker with finely cracked ice and fill with lemonade then shake briefly. Pour (unstrained) into a pint glass. Garnish with half a strawberry and an orange slice.
Ingredients: Lemonade to fill

Name: Stoli O Seduction
About: This citrusy drink will beguile you.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.
Ingredients: Stoli Ohranj Vodka;Fresh grapefruit juice;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup;Pomegranate juice

Name: Seven & Seven
About: Together they make 14 and a sweet sparkling whiskey drink.
HowToMake: Add the ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice and stir gently.
Ingredients: 7UP

Name: Milk & Honey
About: This easy-to-make drink will take you to the Promised Land.
HowToMake: Add the Bénédictine to a mug. Fill with ice top with cold milk and garnish with an orange slice and a cinnamon stick. This cocktail can also be served hot. Simply �-warm up the milk and leave out the ice.).
Ingredients: Bénédictine;Milk

Name: VeeVolette
About: It’s like drinking a bouquet of flowers.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig or edible flower.
Ingredients: VeeV Açaí Spirit;Crème de violette;Lemon juice;Simple syrup

Name: Orange You a Pistachio?
About: Punny name. Serious drink.
HowToMake: Add the tequila orgeat and lime juice to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the bitters. Twist a piece of orange peel over the glass rub it around the rim and drop it into the drink.
Ingredients: El Jimador Tequila;Pistachio orgeat;Lime juice;Angostura Orange Bitters

Name: 81 Old Fashioned
About: This simple bourbon drink is pure old-school.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into an Old Fashioned glass over fresh ice. Garnish with lemon and orange peels.
Ingredients: Demerara syrup (one part demerara sugar one part water);Wild Turkey bourbon;Angostura bitters;Fee Brothers West Indian orange bitters;Regans' Orange Bitters No. 6

Name: Pronto Pronto
About: This Averna cocktail demands to be made immediately.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the lime juice and basil. Add the remaining ingredients except the club soda and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a highball glass. Top with the soda and garnish with a basil leaf lime wheel and lemon wheel.
Ingredients: Lime juice;Sweet basil leaves;Averna Limoni;Averna amaro;Blood orange juice;Egg white;Club soda
Garnish: 1 Basil leaf lime wheel and lemon wheel

Name: The Orkney Chapel
About: This complex Scotch drink inspires reverence.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a cocktail or coupe glass. Garnish with an orange peel.
Ingredients: Highland Park 12-Year-Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky;Lustau Amontillado Sherry;Sugar cane syrup;Grand Marnier;Dolin dry vermouth

Name: Golden Glove - Rum Cocktai
About: This extra-citrusy cousin of the Daiquiri gets a kick from Cointreau.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lime half-wheel.
Ingredients: White rum (Flor de Caña 4-Year-Old Extra Dry);Cointreau;Fresh lime juice;Sugar

Name: Skinny Superfruit Sangria -
About: At just 120 calories this fruity sipper is tasty and good for your waistline.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and pour (unstrained) into a rocks glass. Garnish with chunks of fresh seasonal fruit.
Ingredients: VeeV Açaí Spirit;Red wine;Cranberry juice;Strawberry purée

Name: Açaí Cosmo -
About: Try this rainforest spin on the classic Cosmo.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or a strawberry.
Ingredients: VeeV Açaí Spirit;Grand Marnier or other orange liqueur;Cranberry juice;Fresh lime juice

Name: Açaí Lemonade -
About: Served in a Mason jar this refresher is a summertime staple.
HowToMake: Fill a Mason jar with ice and add the VeeV. Fill with lemonade and add a splash of cranberry juice. Seal the jar shake and garnish with a lemon half-wheel.
Ingredients: VeeV Açaí Spirit;Lemonade;Cranberry juice

Name: French 65
About: Try this extra-citrusy spin on the classic French 75.
HowToMake: Add the Cointreau and bitters to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Top with the Champagne and garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Cointreau;Angostura bitters;Piper-Heidsieck

Name: Heated Affair
About: This hot tequila-and-cider concoction will warm you head to toe.Warm up some more by making this Crock-Pot chicken recipe.
HowToMake: Add the tequila and cider into a warmed Irish Coffee glass. Top with a little heavy cream. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg and a cinnamon stick.
Ingredients: Partida añejo tequila;Hot spiced apple cider;Heavy cream to top

Name: Apple Fool's Martin
About: A drink that tricks the eye and the palate.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the simple syrup and basil. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a thin apple slice or a maraschino cherry.
Ingredients: Simple syrup;Fresh basil leaves;Don Julio blanco tequila;Green Chartreuse;Ruby red grapefruit juice;Lime juice
Garnish: 1 Thin apple slice or maraschino cherry

Name: The Sazerac Cocktail - Rye Whiskey
About: It doesn’t get much more classic than this NOLA standard.
HowToMake: Pack an Old Fashioned glass with ice and set aside. In a second Old Fashioned glass muddle the sugar cube and bitters and add the rye whiskey. Pour the ice out of the first glass add the Herbsaint and rotate the glass to coat the inside discarding any excess. Add the whiskey mixture to the prepared glass and garnish with a lemon peel.
Ingredients: Sugar cube;Peychaud's Bitters;Sazerac Rye Whiskey;Herbsaint

Name: Calvados Sideca
About: Get introduced to French apple brandy with this simple variation on a classic.
HowToMake: Combine equal amounts of cinnamon and sugar on a small saucer. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with the lime or lemon wedge and dip carefully into the sugar mixture so that only the very top of the rim is coated evenly. Place the glass into the freezer to let the sugar rim harden. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Ground cinnamon;Sugar;Lime or lemon wedge;Boulard Hors d'Âge Calvados;Cointreau;Lemon juice

Name: Cinnamon Syru
About: Cinnamon syrup which is used in other recipes
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a small saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat reduce heat to low and simmer for a few minutes. Remove from heat cover and let stand for at least 6 hours. Strain and store in the refrigerator.
Ingredients: Cinnamon sticks broken into pieces;Sugar;Water

Name: Vermiglio
About: This bitter-and-sweet cocktail calls for lots of shaking.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the bitters to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake hard and strain into a pint glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the bitters.
Ingredients: Campari;Sauvignon blanc wine;Lemon juice;Simple syrup (one part sugar one part water);Elderflower liqueur;Egg white;Bitters

Name: Herradura Tequila Luxe
About: A quick and easy version of the Margarita with a refreshing lemon-lime flavor.
HowToMake: In a rocks glass muddle the lime and lemon wedges. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and pour (unstrained) into the prepared glass.
Ingredients: Lime wedges;Lemon wedges;Herradura Blanco Tequila;Agave nectar;Water

Name: Stoli O Main Squeeze
About: This variation on the Screwdriver is packed with citrus flavor.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a tall glass and fill with ice. Fill with club soda and stir. Garnish with an orange wheel.
Ingredients: Stoli Ohranj Vodka;Triple sec;Fresh orange juice;Club soda

Name: La Tour Eiffe
About: Cocktail expert Gary Regan imagines what the Sazerac would be like if invented in France instead of New Orleans.
HowToMake: Pour the absinthe into a chilled Champagne flute tilting and rotating the glass to coat the interior. Add a few ice cubes and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with fresh ice. Stir. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared flute and strain the drink into it. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Absinthe;XO cognac;Cointreau;Suze

Name: Spring's First Bloom
About: So good that even the daffodils take notice.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and double strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a single mint or microgreen leaf.
Ingredients: Hendrick\'s Gin;Lemongrass-Infused Simple Syrup%;Fresh lemon juice;St-Germain;Lavender bitters;Egg white

Name: Tallulah
About: This simple but delicious drink was inspired by the Southern tradition of adding peanuts to a can of Coke.
HowToMake: Add the whiskey and orgeat into a rocks glass and stir until well-combined. Fill with ice and top with the Coca-Cola. Garnish with a small handful of salted peanuts.
Ingredients: Jack Daniels Tennessee whiskey;Peanut orgeat;Coca-Cola

Name: Raspberry Bellini
About: A simple addition to the classic recipe yields huge flavor.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a Champagne flute.
Ingredients: Stoli Razberi Vodka;Raspberry-White Peach Puree;Sparkling wine

Name: French 7
About: Possibly named for a World War I field gun this classic drink packs a wallop.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients except the Champagne into a shaker with ice and shake well. Fine-strain into a Champagne flute. Top with Champagne. Garnish with a long ribbon of lemon peel.
Ingredients: Cognac or gin;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup;Champagne

Name: Tullamore Dew Irish Coffe
About: Salute the Emerald Isle with this spirited cup of joe.
HowToMake: Fill a coffee mug or heat-proof glass with very hot water to warm it and then discard the water. Fill the mug or glass about three-quarters of the way with coffee. Drop in the sugar cubes and stir until thoroughly dissolved. Add the whiskey and top with lightly whipped cream.
Ingredients: Hot coffee;Sugar cubes;Tullamore D.E.W. Irish Whiskey

Name: Inter Continental
About: If you’re worldly and you know it drink this cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Castarède Armagnac Sélection;Amaro Averna;Maraschino liqueur

Name: Scofflaw
About: This whiskey drink was invented in Paris while the U.S. suffered through Prohibition.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Ingredients: Bourbon or rye whiskey;Dry vermouth;Fresh lemon juice;Grenadine;Orange bitters
BaseSpirit: Bourbon / American Whiskey;Rye Whiskey;Vermouth / Aperitif Wine

Name: Patron Perfect Cosmo
About: Like Cosmopolitans? Try this flavorful and easy tequila version of the drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Patrón Silver Tequila;Patrón Citrónge Orange Liqueur;Cranberry juice;Fresh lime juice

Name: Leblon Brazillionaire
About: This cocktail was a Judges Choice Winner and was named Best in Show at the 2010 Wine & Spirits Wholesalers of America Convention.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with two cherries on a cocktail pick or skewer.
Ingredients: Leblon cachaça;Cherry Heering;Passion fruit puree;Fresh lime sour;Fresh cilantro leaves;Sriracha

Name: Cielo Rosso
About: A refreshing Campari-and-vodka drink with a tangy grapefruit twist.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a fresh basil leaf.
Ingredients: Campari;Skyy Infusions Citrus Vodka;Fresh ruby red grapefruit juice;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup

Name: Dubonnet and Champagne
About: Simple but elegant.
HowToMake: Add both ingredients to a Champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Dubonnet Rouge;Champagne

Name: Hudson Rob Ro
About: Mix up this version of the Scottish classic made with single malt whiskey distilled in upstate New York.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a  cherry or lemon twist.
Ingredients: Hudson Single Malt Whiskey;Sweet vermouth;Angostura bitters

Name: Blanco and Tonic
About: Crisp cool and chock full of tequila.
HowToMake: Pour Don Julio Blanco Tequila into a highball glass filled with ice. Top off with tonic water. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Don Julio blanco tequila;Tonic water

Name: Orange Poppy
About: Try this fizzy absinthe drink.
HowToMake: Squeeze the orange wedge into a shaker. Add the absinthe and triple sec and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and pour (unstrained) into a tall glass. Top with the lemon-lime soda and garnish with a mint sprig and orange wheel.
Ingredients: Orange wedge;Lucid absinthe;Triple sec;Lemon-lime soda

Name: Rubia Bonita
About: Muddled strawberries and cilantro bring out tequila’s fresh side.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the cilantro strawberries and lime juice. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake for 10 seconds and double strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an additional strawberry and a few cilantro sprigs.
Ingredients: Fresh cilantro;Strawberries;Fresh lime juice;Patrón Silver Tequila;Aperol;Simple syrup;Orange bitters

Name: Billionaire
About: Feeling spendy? Try this deluxe cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
Ingredients: Baker's bourbon;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup;Grenadine (Employees Only);Absinthe bitters

Name: Berri Sophisticated
About: This punny cocktail is Absolut-ly delectable.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the blueberries. Add the vodka lime juice and simple syrup and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Champagne flute. Top with Champagne and garnish with 3 blueberries on a toothpick.
Ingredients: Absolut Berri Açai Vodka;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup;Perrier-Jouët NV Champagne

Name: Clover Club
About: This pre-Prohibition classic is one of Philadelphia’s contributions to mixological history.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with 3 speared raspberries. *Instead of raspberry syrup you can muddle 3 or 4 fresh raspberries and 1/2 oz simple syrup (1 part sugar 1 part water).
Ingredients: Gin;Egg white;Fresh lemon juice;Raspberry syrup

Name: Caborita
About: Want to party like Sammy Hagar? Try his signature Margarita recipe.
HowToMake: Coat the rim of a large Margarita glass with salt. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Salt;Cabo Wabo Reposado Tequila;Fresh lime juice;Agave nectar

Name: Garrick Club Punc
About: Garrick Club Punch tasted as good in 1835 as it does today.
HowToMake: Peel the lemons with a vegetable peeler avoiding the white pith. Muddle the peels with the sugar in a 3-quart pitcher or punch bowl and let stand for 30 minutes. Add the lemon juice and stir until the sugar has dissolved. Add the gin and Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur or Grand Marnier and stir. Fill the pitcher or bowl halfway with ice and add the seltzer or club soda. Stir again and serve in individual punch or highball glasses.
Ingredients: Lemons;Superfine sugar;Fresh lemon juice;Gin;Luxardo maraschino liqueur;Seltzer water

Name: Old Jamaican
About: Respect your elders.
HowToMake: In a shaker gently muddle the mint and lime juice. Add the remaining ingredients except the Champagne and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with Champagne and garnish with a mint sprig.
Ingredients: Fresh mint;Fresh lime juice;Appleton Estate Reserve rum;Pure cane simple syrup;Angostura bitters;Champagne

Name: Gibson
About: The Martini‘s savory second cousin the Gibson uses a pickled cocktail onion in place of the typical briny olive to add an umami undertone to the classic cocktail. The Gibson is believed to have been created by San Francisco businessman Walter D.K. Gibson in the late 1800s who thought that eating onions prevented colds hence the addition of the mini allium.
HowToMake: Add the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail onion.
Ingredients: Gin or vodka;Dry vermouth

Name: Francophile
About: Say merci beaucoup to a glass of this warm wine-based drink.
