HowToMake: Muddle the peppercorns in a shaker. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a few more peppercorns.
Ingredients: Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur;Fresh lemon juice;Fresh ruby red grapefruit juice;Premium tequila

Name: Pomchi Smash
About: A fruity taste of summer.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the raspberries and mint leaves. Add the remaining ingredients except the ginger ale and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball or large wine glass filled with fresh ice. Top with ginger ale and garnish with a raspberry and a mint sprig.
Ingredients: Raspberries;Mint leaves;Ron Abuelo Añejo;Cranberry juice;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup;Angostura bitters;Ginger ale

Name: 56 Julep
About: Named for Jimmy Russell’s 56 years distilling Wild Turkey.
HowToMake: In a traditional silver julep cup or double Old Fashioned glass muddle the mint brown sugar and 1 ounce of the bourbon. Add the ice and remaining bourbon and garnish with a sprig of mint.
Ingredients: Mint;Brown sugar;Wild Turkey 101 Bourbon;crushed ice

Name: Horse's Neck
About: The American-whiskey classic has only two ingredients.
HowToMake: Add the whiskey to a Collins glass filled with ice. Fill with ginger ale and garnish with a long strip of lemon peel.
Ingredients: Bourbon brandy or American rye whiskey;Ginger ale

Name: Preakness
About: A splash of herbal Bénédictine gives this Manhattan variation added complexity.
HowToMake: Add all in the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: American rye whiskey;Sweet vermouth;Bénédictine;Angostura bitters

Name: Royal Balmoral Punch
About: Named for the Royal Family’s Scottish summer home this drink combines fine single malt and good English tea.
HowToMake: Add the Scotch syrup and apple juice to a teacup and add a large ice cube. Top with equal amounts of lemonade and Champagne. Garnish with a lemon wheel and thistle. (This recipe can multiplied to serve a crowd: Mix in a punch bowl with a large block of ice.).
Ingredients: Glenfiddich 21-year-old single-malt scotch;Tea syrup;Granny Smith apple juice;Lemonade;Champagne;Thistle

Name: Hot in Rio
About: This chile pepper lime and cachaça cocktail captures the spirit of Brazilian Carnaval.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the agave nectar chile pepper slices and lime wedges. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with crushed ice. Shake and pour (unstrained) into a rocks glass. Garnish with additional chile pepper slices or a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Agave nectar;Chile pepper slices;Lime wedges;Leblon cachaça;Lime juice;Salt
Garnish: 1 Chile pepper slices or lime wedge

Name: Man o' War
About: Named for one of the finest racehorses in history this citrusy bourbon drink inspires.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a skewered lemon peel and brandied cherry.
Ingredients: Bourbon;Orange curaçao or triple sec;Sweet vermouth;Fresh lemon juice

Name: Princess Mary's Pride
About: This calvados cocktail was created in honor of Princess Mary’s 1922  wedding.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.
Ingredients: Calvados (or other apple brandy);Dubonnet Rouge;Dry vermouth

Name: Double Eagle
About: A set of international flavors livens up this bourbon cocktail.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the lemon and basil. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake and double strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a grapefruit peel and Thai basil leaf.
Ingredients: Lemon;Thai basil;Basil Hayden\'s Bourbon;Aperol;Simple syrup
Garnish: 1 Grapefruit peel and Thai basil leaf

Name: Grand Sidecar
About: Simple sweet and sour.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker (adjusting simple syrup to tartness of lemons) and fill with ice. Shake hard and strain into a chilled Martini glass half-rimmed with sugar.
Ingredients: Grand Marnier;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup

Name: Diamond Blue
About: Inspired by Kate Middleton’s giant sapphire engagement ring this luxurious cocktail is royally delicious.
HowToMake: Add the gin crème de violette and Curaçao to a mixing glass. Squeeze the lemon wedge into the glass and discard. Fill with ice. Stir and strain into a Champagne flute. Top with the Champagne and garnish with a light dusting of edible silver powder.
Ingredients: Hendrick's Gin;Crème de violette;Blue curaçao;Lemon wedge;Champagne

Name: Louisville
About: You don’t have to be in Kentucky to enjoy this three-ingredient bourbon cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a large orange twist.
Ingredients: Basil Hayden's Bourbon;Lillet Rouge;Lillet Blanc

Name: Breakfast Margarita
About: Start your day with this delicious orange-marmalade Margarita.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice.
Ingredients: Tequila;Fresh lime juice;Cointreau;Orange marmalade;Agave syrup

Name: Celery Cup No. 1
About: With celery cilantro and cucumber it’s like a liquid salad.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the cucumber celery cilantro and lemon juice to a pulp. Add the vodka agave nectar and Pimm's and fill with ice. Shake hard for 10 seconds and strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a leafy celery stalk from the heart.
Ingredients: Celery (use a piece closer to the heart for sweetness);Cilantro (about a quarter cup);English cucumber;Fresh lemon juice;Square One cucumber vodka;Agave nectar;Pimm's No. 1

Name: Patrón Grapefruit
About: Grapefruit is a great match for tequila and orange liqueur.
HowToMake: Add the tequila and liqueur to a highball glass full of ice. Top with grapefruit juice. Add a splash of club soda and garnish with lemon and lime slices.
Ingredients: Patrón Silver Tequila;Patrón Citrónge Orange Liqueur;Grapefruit juice;Club soda

Name: Basil Hayden’s Kentucky Buc
About: As majestic and strong as its namesake.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
Ingredients: Basil Hayden\'s Bourbon;DeKuyper Triple Sec;Orange juice;Cranberry juice;Simple syrup

Name: Navan Smash
About: Brighten your evening with this vanilla mint and lemon cocktail.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the lemon wedges and mint leaves. Add the Navan and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a mint sprig stuck into a lemon wheel.
Ingredients: Lemon wedges;Mint leaves;Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur

Name: Skinny Mojito
About: Its flavor is full-size.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the mint and lime. Add the rum and agave nectar and fill with ice. Shake and pour (unstrained) into a highball glass. Top with club soda and garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Mint leaves;Lime wedges;Rum;Agave nectar;Club soda

Name: Grand Sangria
About: An orange twist on the classic fruity wine concoction.
HowToMake: Combine all the ingredients except the orange juice and wine in a punch bowl and let stand at least 1 hour. Stir the orange juice and wine and serve in ice-filled punch cups or wine glasses.
Ingredients: Grand Marnier;Seedless red or black grapes;Lemons sliced;Orange sliced;Apples red and green cored and cut into .5 inch wedges;Cinnamon sticks;Superfine sugar;Orange juice;Casa Lapostolle Merlot chilled

Name: Vita Coco Caipirinha
About: The South American cocktail endorsed by Demi Moore and Madonna.
HowToMake: Fill an Old Fashioned glass with ice. Squeeze the lime wedges into the glass and then add the wedges and sugar. Fill the glass a third of the way with cachaca. Fill with Vita Coco Tangerine and stir gently.
Ingredients: Lime wedges;Sugar;Cachaça;Vita Coco Tangerine

Name: Hot Caramel Buttered Rum
About: The ultimate indulgence: a sweet caramel-and-spice cocktail with a pat of rich butter.
HowToMake: In a mug stir together the butter brown sugar honey and spices until they've formed a batter. Add the remaining ingredients and stir vigorously until the batter is fully dissolved. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.
Ingredients: Unsalted butter softened;Brown sugar;Honey;Ground cinnamon;Ground cloves;Ground nutmeg;Ron Abuelo Añejo Rum;Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka;Hot water add more if desired

Name: The Collins
About: The classic original from the original celebrity bartender Jerry Thomas.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the soda to a shaker and fill with large hard cold ice cubes. Shake and double-strain into a Collins glass fill with fresh ice. Top with soda and garnish with a lemon wedge.
Ingredients: Bols genever;Fresh lemon juice;Rich simple syrup;Club soda

Name: Black Velvet
About: High-class meets working-class.
HowToMake: Fill a highball glass halfway with beer. Pouring over a spoon into the glass fill to the top with Champagne.
Ingredients: Guinness Beer;Champagne (or sparkling wine)

Name: Pisco Sour
About: Chile and Peru bicker fiercely over the birthright of the Pisco Sour but by most accounts the drink originated with an American. Expat bartender Victor Morris is believed to have concocted the frothy smooth cocktail in his Lima bar in the 1920s. Blending pisco lime juice egg white and Angostura bitters the Pisco Sour is simultaneously earthy sweet and tart—a cocktail worth fighting over.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice. (Alternately you can pour it neat into a Nick & Nora glass.). Garnish with 3 drops of the bitters. Using a straw swirl the bitters into a simple design.
Ingredients: Pisco;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup;Egg white

Name: Strawberry Daiquiri
About: The Strawberry Daiquiri is a classic summertime drink. Chill down with this frosty rum concoction.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a Margarita glass or wine goblet. Garnish with an edible orchid and a cocktail umbrella.
Ingredients: Aged Puerto Rican or Jamaican rum;Fresh lime juice;Rich simple syrup (2 parts sugar 1 part water);Strawberry;Ice cubes

Name: Savory Margarita
About: A sip of this concoction will convince you that red bell pepper deserves a place behind the bar.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Milagro reposado tequila;Fresh red bell pepper juice;Fresh lime juice;Honey syrup (one part honey one part water);Fresh cilantro

Name: Wilson's Smash
About: Caramelized pineapple syrup makes this tropical rum drink something very special.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients except the club soda to a shaker with ice and shake. Fine-strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Top with a splash of club soda. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
Ingredients: Brugal extra viejo rum;Fresh lime juice;Caramelized Pineapple Syrup;Angostura bitters;Absinthe;Fresh mint;Club soda

Name: Sparkling Holiday Punch
About: Every day is a holiday with this fizzy fruity vodka punch.
HowToMake: In a large bowl muddle the orange peels and sugar to form a paste. Add the lemon juice syrup and both vodkas and stir to combine. Place a large block of ice in a punch bowl and add the vodka mixture. Top with the sparkling wine and water. Stir and garnish with thinly cut lemon wheels and thin slices of fig.
Ingredients: Navel oranges;Sugar;Fresh lemon juice;Fig-Infused Tea Syrup%;Stoli White Pomegranik Vodka;Stoli Blueberi Vodka;Sparkling wine;Water chilled

Name: Very Sexy Martini
About: Celebrate in style.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the raspberries and mint. Add the remaining ingredients except the Champagne and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Top with the Champagne and garnish with a mint spring and a raspberry.
Ingredients: Raspberries;Mint leaves;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup (one part sugar one part water);Citrus vodka;Moët & Chandon Rosé Imperial Champagne

Name: Witch's Brew
About: Indulge with this chocolate-raspberry vodka and Champagne treat.
HowToMake: Add the vodka and crème de cassis to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute. Top with chilled Champagne.
Ingredients: Godiva Chocolate Raspberry Infused Vodka;Crème de Cassis;Champagne

Name: Corzo Tequila Toast
About: Put on your top hat and tails to drink this sparkling concoction.
HowToMake: Add the tequila and cognac to a chilled Champagne flute and fill with Champagne. Garnish with raspberries.
Ingredients: Corzo Silver Tequila;Vanilla cognac;Champagne

Name: Cinnamon Sparkle
About: Crémant d’Alsace sparkling wine completes this tasty rum-and-cognac cocktail.
HowToMake: In a mixing glass muddle the sugar cubes in the club soda until dissolved. Stir in the remaining ingredients except for the wine one at a time. Fill with ice and continue stirring until chilled. Strain into a coupe or punch glass and top with the wine. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.
Ingredients: Sugar cubes;Club soda;Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Grand Reserve Rum;Camus VSOP Cognac;Marie Brizard Peach Liqueur;Lemon juice;Cinnamon bark syrup;Crémant d'Alsace wine

Name: Ginepro Amaro
About: An old-school recipe for a gin-and-juice.
HowToMake: In a mixing glass stir the ingredients with large hard cold ice cubes and double strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Bols genever;Sweet vermouth;Fresh ruby red grapefruit juice;Rich sugar syrup

Name: E-Sencha-L
About: Don’t pass up this gin-and-tea cocktail.
HowToMake: Add both ingredients to a Martini glass or small tea cup and stir to combine. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.
Ingredients: Beefeater 24 Gin;Sencha tea (chilled)

Name: Baileys Peppermint Cream
About: Hot chocolate + minty liqueur + whipped cream = an adult dessert.
HowToMake: Pour the Baileys and hot chocolate into a coffee mug. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and sprinkle crushed candy cane on top. Garnish with a mint leaf.
Ingredients: Baileys with a Hint of Mint Chocolate;Hot chocolate;Fresh whipped cream;Candy canes crushed

Name: Passion Potion
About: Cupid would approve of this rum fruit and basil recipe.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously for 5 seconds and strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a basil leaf.
Ingredients: Don Q Crystal Rum;Don Q Limon Rum;Passion fruit puree;Lime juice;Simple syrup;Basil leaves

Name: The Manhattan 101
About: A mint and ginger version of  the standard formula.
HowToMake: Muddle the ginger mint powdered sugar and bitters in a cocktail shaker. Add the Wild Turkey Bourbon both vermouths and ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Ingredients: Wild Turkey Bourbon;Dry vermouth;Sweet vermouth;Fresh ginger;Mint leaves;Powdered sugar;Aromatic bitters

Name: Grey Goose Mediterranean Mary
About: Olive tapenade and herbs take this savory Bloody Mary to another level.
HowToMake: Rub the lemon wedge on the outer edge of a tall glass and then roll the glass lip in the salt. Add the remaining ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a cucumber spear and an olive.
Ingredients: Lemon wedge;Coarse salt;Grey Goose Vodka (Original or Le Citron);Dry sherry;Mediterranean Mary Mix

Name: Tom Collins
About: Master the all-time gin classic. The Tom Collins is essentially a sparkling lemonade spiked with a healthy dose of the juniper spirit. While there is a debate which side of the pond this drink was born this cocktail lives up to his classic status with every sip.
HowToMake: Add the gin lemon juice and simple syrup into a Collins glass. Fill with ice top with club soda and stir. Garnish with a lemon wheel and maraschino cherry (optional).
Ingredients: London dry gin;Fresh lemon juice;Simple syrup;Club soda to top

Name: Leblon Coco Caipirinha
About: You put the lime in the coconut and drink ’em both together.
HowToMake: Muddle the lime and sugar in a shaker. Add the Leblon Cachaça fill with ice and shake well. Pour unstrained into an old fashioned glass and top with Vita Coco. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Lime cut into wedges;Superfine sugar;Leblon cachaça;Coconut water

Name: Monte Cassino
About: Two French liqueurs plus American rye and lemon juice equals one fine drink.
HowToMake: Shake all the ingredients with ice. Fine strain the mixture into a chilled coupe or small cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Bénédictine;Yellow Chartreuse;Fresh lemon juice;Rittenhouse Rye

Name: El Bicentenario
About: Celebrate with this spicy tangerine and tequila cocktail.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the habanero and tangerine. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a tangerine wheel.
Ingredients: Habanero pepper;Tangerine quartered;Cabo Wabo Reposado Tequila;Agave syrup (1 part agave nectar 1 part water);Lime juice

Name: Green Deacon
About: Gin grapefruit juice and absinthe make one tasty drink.
HowToMake: Rinse a chilled cocktail or coupe glass with absinthe and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.
Ingredients: Absinthe (St. George);Plymouth gin;Grapefruit juice;Plymouth Sloe Gin

Name: Red Hook
About: Honor the hip Brooklyn neighborhood with this version of the Manhattan.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.
Ingredients: Rye Whiskey;Punt e Mes;Maraschino liqueur

Name: Sage Passage
About: Mango pomegranate and sage for a nice autumn note.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a spanked sage leaf and a cucumber wheel.
Ingredients: Absolut Mango Vodka;Fresh sage leaves;Lemon juice;Simple syrup;Pomegranate juice
Garnish: 1 Spanked sage leaf and cucumber wheel

Name: Liberation Libation
About: Maple syrup apple cider and Vermont vodka: How much more autumnal could you get?
HowToMake: Combine equal parts cinnamon and sugar on a shallow plate and use to coat the rim of a cocktail glass. Add the vodka and maple syrup to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into the prepared glass. Top with the cider.
Ingredients: Cinnamon;Sugar;Vermont Gold Vodka;Maple syrup;Sparkling apple cider (non-alcoholic)

Name: The Goldwyn Follies
About: An old-timey name for a tasty fall gin-and-tea drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail or coupe glass. Garnish with thin apple slices.
Ingredients: Gin;Cinnamon syrup;Apple juice;Cranberry juice;Brewed black tea chilled

Name: Gold Label Frost
About: What happens when you add Scotch to apple cider?
HowToMake: Add the Johnnie Walker apple cider and apple bitters to a Collins glass filled with ice and stir. Garnish with a lemon peel.
Ingredients: Johnnie Walker Gold Label Scotch Whisky;Apple cider;Apple bitters

Name: Lavender Honey Cream
About: This luscious drink looks as beautiful as it tastes.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake gently for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a few lavender blossoms.
Ingredients: Organic heavy cream;Organic egg white;Lavender Honey Syrup

Name: Singapore Raffles Sling
About: This classic is named for the hotel where it was invented.
HowToMake: Pour the gin Bénédictine and cherry brandy into a sling or highball glass. Fill with ice and top with club soda. Squeeze a lime wedge over the drink drop it into the glass and stir. Garnish with a cherry.
Ingredients: Bombay Sapphire gin;Bénédictine liqueur;Cherry brandy;Club soda

Name: The Holland House
About: A little lemon juice and dry vermouth fire up this classic cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with large cold hard ice cubes. Shake and double-strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Bols genever;Noilly Prat dry vermouth;Fresh lemon juice;Maraschino liqueur

Name: Eau De VeeV
About: Start your night with this refreshing bubbly and citrus concoction.
HowToMake: Squeeze the fruit wedges into a highball glass filled with ice and then drop them in. Add the VeeV and the lime juice and stir. Top with the tonic water and garnish with a citrus wheel.
Ingredients: Lemon wedge;Lime wedge;Orange wedge;VeeV Açaí Spirit;Rose's Lime Juice;Tonic

Name: Triple Citrus 24
About: Load up on vitamin C.
HowToMake: Add both ingredients to a Collins or highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel lime wheel and orange wheel.
Ingredients: Beefeater 24 Gin;Tonic water (such as Q Tonic)
Garnish: 1 Lemon wheel lime wheel and orange wheel

Name: Strawberry Cranberry Mule
About: Sweet and tart without a kick.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the strawberries and cranberries. Add the vodka lime juice and simple syrup and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the ginger beer and garnish with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Strawberries;Fresh cranberries;Chopin Vodka;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup;Ginger beer

Name: Cosmo Rita
About: This is what happens when Carrie and the gals go to Mexico.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake for 11 seconds and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Tequila;Cranberry juice;DeKuyper Triple Sec;Fresh lime juice

Name: Sage Lady
About: This drink’s herb flavor is perfect for an autumn cocktail party.
HowToMake: Tear the sage leaves to release their oils and drop them into a shaker. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sage leaf.
Ingredients: Sage leaves;VeeV Açaí Spirit;Green Chartreuse;Lemon juice;Simple syrup (one part sugar one part water)

Name: Dubonnet
About: Like Martinis? Try this complex drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Dubonnet Rouge;Gin;Angostura bitters

Name: Baileys Cool Raspberry
About: Chill out with this simple rich and fruity drink.
HowToMake: In a rocks glass muddle the raspberries. Add the Baileys and fill with crushed ice. Garnish with 3 speared raspberries.
Ingredients: Baileys Original Irish Cream;Raspberries

Name: Yamazaki Autumn Delight
About: Celebrate the season with this whisky-and-cider cocktail.
HowToMake: Add the whisky and cider to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Dust with ground cinnamon and garnish with 2 apple slices and a cinnamon stick.
Ingredients: Yamazaki 12-Year-Old Japanese Single Malt Whisky;Apple cider;Ground cinnamon

Name: Albarino Mint Julep
About: The crisp freshness of the Spanish white wine pairs perfectly with fresh mint.
HowToMake: Add both ingredients to a julep or large old fashioned glass. Add lots of crushed ice and garnish lavishly with mint.
Ingredients: Albariño wine (Terras Gauda Abadia de San Campio 2009);Crème de pêche (or high-quality peach liqueur)

Name: Pisco Punch
About: Get to know Peru’s national spirit in this tropical cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a white wine glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with pineapple chunks and a cherry.
Ingredients: BarSol Primero pisco;Dole pineapple juice;Fresh lime juice;Simple syrup;Pineapple chunks

Name: The Sherry-Netherland
About: Dutch genever and Spanish sherry make this cocktail a European tour in a glass.
HowToMake: Add enough raisins to cover the bottom of a shaker and muddle. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake and double-strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with four speared raisins.
Ingredients: Raisins;Bols genever;Pedro Ximénez sherry;Orange curaçao;Orange bitters

Name: Nomayo
About: It’s strong suave and sophisticated.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled coupe or Martini glass. Float the Champagne on top and garnish with a lime twist.
Ingredients: Plymouth gin;St-Germain;Aperol;Fresh lemon juice;Champagne

Name: Partida Margarita
About: Reintroduce yourself to this simple-to-make classic.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled Margarita or cocktail glass or an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Partida blanco tequila;Fresh lime juice;Agave syrup (one part agave nectar one part water)

Name: Cardamom Pear Martini
About: Get into an autumn mood.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the pear and cardamom. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake and double strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a pear fan.
Ingredients: Quarter of a pear;Cardamom pod;Chopin Vodka;Simple syrup;Lemon bitters;Fresh lemon juice

Name: Desert Pear Mojito
About: A little pear syrup turns the basic Mojito into a great fall cocktail.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the lime and mint. Add the rum and pear syrup and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Top with a splash of lemon-lime soda and garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Lime wedges;Mint leaves;Bacardi Superior Rum;Monin Desert Pear Syrup;Lemon-lime soda

Name: Leblon Caipirinha
About: You don’t improve a Caipirinha by complicating the classic recipe. What’s important is choosing the right cachaça. And there’s no better option than Leblon.
HowToMake: Muddle the lime and sugar in a shaker add the cachaça and ice and shake well. Pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Lime (cut into wedges);superfine sugar (or 1 oz simple syrup);Leblon cachaça

Name: Grand Mimosa
About: Punch up this brunch favorite with a splash of Grand Marnier.
HowToMake: Add the Grand Marnier and fresh orange juice to a Champagne flute and top with Champagne. Garnish with a strawberry (optional).
Ingredients: Grand Marnier;Fresh orange juice;Chilled Champagne

Name: Watermelon Mojito
About: Savor the dog days of summer with this fruity cooler.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the mint lime juice agave nectar and watermelon. Add the rum and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Large mint leaves;a small lime;Agave nectar;Seedless watermelon;Light rum

Name: The Royal Crest
About: Rémy Martin Cognac and white wine crowned with a fresh-grape garnish.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the grapes and simple syrup. Add the cognac and wine and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the club soda and garnish with additional grapes.
Ingredients: Simple syrup;1738 Accord Royal Rémy Martin Cognac;Sancerre or sauvignon blanc wine;Club soda

Name: Beefeater Summer and Cranberry
About: There’s still time to make this seasonal cocktail before the beginning of fall.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a tall glass filled with ice. Stir and garnish with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Beefeater Summer Edition Gin;Cranberry juice;Fresh lime juice

Name: Chopin Red Wine
About: Sip on summer with this berry-and-juice cocktail.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the berries. Add the remaining ingredients and shake without ice. Fill with ice and stir briefly. Strain into a stemless wine glass and garnish with a raspberry blackberry and cranberry on a skewer.
Ingredients: Raspberries;Blackberries;Cranberries;Chopin Vodka;Cherry juice;Noilly Prat Rouge Vermouth

Name: Black Gold
About: You don’t need to be an oil tycoon to enjoy this cocktail.
HowToMake: Pour the vodka into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with black pepper.
Ingredients: Ice

Name: Absolut Berri Acai Sour
About: The super-food-trifecta: açai blueberry and pomegranate.
HowToMake: Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with blueberries and a mint sprig.
Ingredients: Absolut Berri Açai Vodka;Simple syrup;Fresh lemon juice

Name: Oranje Burst
About: A vodka and citrus explosion.
HowToMake: Pour Van Gogh Oranje Vodka and orange juice into a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a flute. Top with sparkling wine and garnish with an orange slice.
Ingredients: Van Gogh Oranje Vodka;Sparkling wine;Orange juice

Name: Brazilian
About: Toast the host of the 2016 Olympics with this acai blueberry and lemonade combo.
HowToMake: Add Van Gogh Açai-Blueberry Vodka and lemonade to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
Ingredients: Van Gogh açaí-blueberry vodka;Lemonade

Name: Brazilian Sangria
About: Take a trip south of the equator with this tasty Sangria.
HowToMake: In a shaker thoroughly muddle the fruit with the absinthe cachaça brandy and orange liqueur. Pour into a wine glass. Float the red wine on top and stir briefly.
Ingredients: Fresh seasonal fruit (such as strawberry lime orange kiwi and passion fruit);Lucid absinthe;Cachaca;Spanish brandy;Orange liqueur;Red wine

Name: Absolut 100 Pumpkin Martini
About: Celebrate Halloween year-round.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.
Ingredients: Absolut 100 Vodka;Hiram Walker Pumpkin Spice Liqueur;splash Simple syrup

Name: The Nose to
About: Much better than the grindstone.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and shake vigorously without ice for 10 seconds. Fill with ice and shake for 10 seconds more. Strain into a highball glass.
Ingredients: Whole egg;Bacon-infused Bushmills Irish Whiskey;Grade B maple syrup;Orange juice;Lemon juice

Name: Absolut Boston Home Run
About: Have a few thirsty buddies? Mix up a few of these for a grand slam.
HowToMake: Add ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice.
Ingredients: Absolut Boston Vodka;White grape juice;Ginger ale

Name: Holiday Glög
About: Just because the holidays are technically over it doesn’t mean you can’t drink some Glögg.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a saucepan over medium heat. Simmer very lightly for at least 30 minutes (do not boil). Remove and discard the mulling spices. Serve in mugs garnishing each with a few raisins and blanched almonds.
Ingredients: Skyy Vodka;Dry red wine;Mulling spices;Fresh orange zest;Sugar

Name: Berry Tulip
About: Two ingredients many flavors.
HowToMake: Add the vodka to a rocks glass filled with ice. Top with lemonade and garnish with blueberries.
Ingredients: Van Gogh açaí-blueberry vodka;Pink lemonade

Name: Snickertini
About: Have one for dessert.
HowToMake: Drizzle thin lines of caramel and chocolate sauce on the inside of a rocks glass and chill in the refrigerator. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and pour (unstrained) into the prepared glass.
Ingredients: Chocolate sauce;Caramel sauce;Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka;Baileys Irish Cream;Chocolate liqueur;Amaretto;Cream

Name: Van Gogh Dutch Appel Sangria
About: Apple vodka gives the wine punch an autumnal feel.
HowToMake: Combine the Van Gogh Wild Appel Vodka orange liqueur white wine and pineapple juice in a large pitcher. Mix in the sugar until it's completely dissolved. Add in all the fresh fruit and put the pitcher into the refrigerator for at least an hour. Serve over ice.
Ingredients: Dry white wine;Van Gogh Wild Appel Vodka;Orange liqueur;Pineapple juice;Fresh apple slices;Fresh pear slices;Fresh starfruit slices;Lemon slices;Sugar

Name: Starry Night
About: This vodka cocktail is good whether or not you can see stars.
HowToMake: Pour chilled Van Gogh Açai-Blueberry Vodka into a flute. Top with sparkling rosé wine and garnish with a starfruit.
Ingredients: Sparkling rosé;Chilled Van Gogh Açai-Blueberry Vodka

Name: Pomosa
About: Stronger than a mere Mimosa.
HowToMake: Pour the vodka into a Champagne flute. Top with the sparkling wine. Garnish with a strawberry.
Ingredients: Van Gogh pomegranate vodka chilled;Sparkling wine

Name: PomPom
About: Start your own cheer with this pomegranate cocktail.
HowToMake: Fill an ice cube tray with a mix of equal parts pomegranate juice and water and freeze over night. Place cubes in a tall glass and top with Van Gogh Pomegranate Vodka. Garnish the drink with an orange wheel.
Ingredients: POM Wonderful Pomegranate Juice;Van Gogh Pomegranate Vodka

Name: Leche Mexicana (Mexican Milk)
About: Milk does a body good even when there’s tequila in it.
HowToMake: Pour all the ingredients into a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain the mixture into a small glass.
Ingredients: Hornitos Plata Tequila;DeKuyper Crème de Cocoa White Cream;Half & half

Name: Finlandia Vodka Cranberry French Martini
About: A Finnish twist on an old Parisian classic.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: Finlandia Cranberry Fusion Vodka;Chambord;Pineapple juice

Name: Hornitos Holiday Smash
About: Seasonal fruits are the key to this drink’s winter flavor.
HowToMake: In a sturdy double Old Fashioned glass muddle the cloves. Add the pear lemon orange and simple syrup and muddle again. Fill with ice add the tequila and stir to combine.
Ingredients: Cloves;Fresh pear;Lemon wedge;Orange wedge;Simple syrup;Hornitos Añejo Tequila

Name: Chopin Poinsettia Martini
About: Just as pretty as the holiday plant and this one sparkles too.
HowToMake: Add the vodka and cranberry juice to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Top with the Champagne and garnish with raspberries.
Ingredients: Chopin Vodka;Cranberry juice;Moët & Chandon Champagne

Name: Summer Martini
About: Beefeater’s special Summer Edition Gin packs a heavy dose of floral flavor.
HowToMake: Add both ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry and a raspberry on a toothpick.
Ingredients: Beefeater Summer Edition Gin;Dry vermouth

Name: Fireside Cosmo Wine
About: Warm up with this shiraz-and-vodka drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: Yellow Tail Shiraz;Blueberry vodka;Grand Marnier;Açai juice;Lime

Name: Midori Merry Berry Bowl
About: The red-and-green punch screams Christmas cheer.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into a cocktail or punch glass. Garnish with the cranberries pear slices pierced with cloves 2 cinnamon sticks and winter melon balls. To make a punch version multiply the recipe by eight.
Ingredients: Midori Melon Liqueur;Flor de Cana Rum Platino;Pear liqueur;Pear juice;White cranberry juice
Garnish: 1 Cranberries pear slices pierced with cloves 2 cinnamon sticks and winter melon balls

Name: Autumn Side Car Wine[tail]
About: A chardonnay twist on a cocktail classic.
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the orange basil and agave nectar. Add the wine and brandy and fill with ice. Shake well and double-strain into a chilled Martini glass. Add a splash of Grand Marnier and garnish with an orange twist and an orange slice.
Ingredients: Orange slices;Fresh basil leaves;Agave nectar;Yellow Tail Chardonnay wine;Brandy;Grand Marnier

Name: Zen Merry Manhattan
About: Find your center with this whiskey and green tea liqueur cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass. Add ice and stir briskly for 20 seconds. Strain into a chilled 4 oz cocktail glass. Garnish with a sugar covered cherry.
Ingredients: Zen Green Tea Liqueur;Yamazaki 12-Year-Old Whisky;Cinzano sweet vermouth;Bitters

Name: Warming Zen
About: Chase away the chills and find enlightenment.
HowToMake: Add the liqueur whiskey and simple syrup to a coffee mug. Stir and then add steamed milk. Finish with a sprinkle of matcha and cocoa powders. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.
Ingredients: Zen Green Tea Liqueur;Tullamore D.E.W. Irish Whiskey;Simple syrup (one part sugar one part water);Steamed milk;Matcha powder;Cocoa powder

Name: Midori Peppermint Kiss
About: Try this minty and fruity cocktail with a hint of melon.
HowToMake: In a chilled shaker glass add all the ingredients. Add ice shake for 15 seconds and strain into a Collins glass. Garnish with a basil leaf and one raspberry.
Ingredients: Midori Melon Liqueur;Skyy Vodka;Pineapple juice;Fresh lemon juice;Peppermint schnapps;Basil leaves gently torn in half

Name: Seasonal Cocktails We Love: The Holiday Sparkle
About: Sparks will fly with this sparkling rose and cranberry juice cocktail.
HowToMake: Soak a sugar cube in orange bitters. Place it in a flute. Add elderflower liqueur and cranberry juice and gently top off the drink with Yellow Tail Rose. Garnish with a rock candy stir stick.
Ingredients: Yellowtail Sparkling Rose;Elderflower liqueur;Cranberry juice;Orange bitters;Sugar cube

Name: Holiday Cheer
About: Its fizzy cranberry flavor and savory rosemary garnish will make you happy.
HowToMake: Muddle the cranberries in a shaker. Fill with ice add the vodka and shake vigorously.  Pour into a tall glass and top with the tonic water and sparkling cider. Garnish with a rosemary sprig.
Ingredients: Cranberries;Vodka;Tonic water;Sparkling cider

Name: Couture-tini
About: Two wines and some strawberries; what’s not to like?
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the Korbel to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Top with Korbel and garnish with a strawberry.
Ingredients: Little Black Dress Chardonnay;Strawberry purée;Agave nectar;Korbel Brut Sparkling Wine

Name: Fashionista
About: She knows how to spice up a Little Black Dress.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Gently roll the shaker to mix and pour into a tall glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Ingredients: Little Black Dress Pinot Noir;Pomegranate juice;Lime juice;Agave nectar

Name: Chopin Holiday Punch
About: Satisfy a houseful of party guests with this festive libation.
HowToMake: In a large pitcher combine all the ingredients except the club soda and bitters. Cover with plastic wrap and chill for 24 hours. To serve pour the mixture into rocks or Collins glasses filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda and a dash of bitters.
Ingredients: Chopin Vodka;Grand Marnier;Fresh lime juice;Cranberry juice;Fresh mint;Cucumber sliced;Pear;Apple;Club soda;Angostura bitters

Name: Moon Mountain Raspberry Sling
About: Overload on raspberry flavor with this gingery drink
HowToMake: In a shaker muddle the raspberries. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with fresh raspberries and a lime twist.
Ingredients: Fresh raspberries;Moon Mountain Wild Raspberry Flavored Vodka;Lime juice;Ginger syrup;Tonic water

Name: Coastal Citrus & Basil
About: A couple basil leaves add depth and complexity to a simple lemony cocktail.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel and/or basil sprig.
Ingredients: Moon Mountain Coastal Citrus Flavored Vodka;Lemonade;Simple syrup;Fresh basil leaves

Name: Moon Mountain Greyhound
About: This is a fruitier take on the classic grapefruit concoction.
HowToMake: If desired coat the rim of a rocks glass with salt. Fill with ice and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a grapefruit peel and/or a fresh rosemary sprig.
Ingredients: Salt (optional);Moon Mountain Wild Raspberry Flavored Vodka;Elderflower liqueur;Ruby red grapefruit juice;Orgeat Syrup

Name: Citrus Flower Sour
About: It’s rhyme time with this sweet-and-tart vodka drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: Moon Mountain Coastal Citrus Flavored Vodka;Elderflower liqueur;Lemon juice;Almond syrup

Name: The Irish Car Bomb
About: Making an Irish Car Bomb is easy. Grab a pint and detonate this guilty pleasure.
HowToMake: Add the Baileys and whiskey to a shot glass. Drop the shot into a half-pint of the beer.
Ingredients: Baileys Irish cream;Irish whiskey;Guinness beer

Name: Flaming Dr. Pepper Sho
About: Please have a fire extinguisher handy.
HowToMake: Fill a pint glass halfway with beer. Add the amaretto to a shot glass and top with the rum. Set the rum on fire and very carefully drop the shot glass into the beer.This is one drink best to order in a bar and not make at home.
Ingredients: Beer;Amaretto;Rum

Name: Plumdog Millionair
About: You don’t have to be rich to enjoy this plum cocktail.
HowToMake: Coat the rim of a Martini glass with lavender sugar and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a black plum half-wheel.
Ingredients: Lavender sugar;Bulldog GIn;Japanese plum wine;Lavender soda

Name: New Year’s Sparkler
About: Ring it in with fruit and bubbly.
HowToMake: Add the vodka and cranberry juice to a chilled Champagne flute. Top with Champagne and garnish with 5-6 raspberries on a long skewer.
Ingredients: Berry-flavored vodka;Pomegranate juice;Champagne

Name: Finlandia Vodka Wild Berritini
About: Berries berries and berriesin the vodka liqueur and garnishmake this an ideal summer drink.
HowToMake: Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail class. Top with the club soda and garnish with fresh berries.
Ingredients: Finlandia Wild Berries Fusion Vodka;Finlandia Vodka;Chambord;Club soda

Name: VeeV Holiday Highball
About: After a long day shopping for the holidays reward yourself with this Veev holiday cocktail.
HowToMake: Muddle the mint and simple syrup in the bottom of a shaker. Add VeeV Açaí Spirit Green Chartreuse and ice. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass and top with sparkling cider. Garnish with an apple chip.
Ingredients: VeeV Açaí Spirit;Green Chartreuse;Sparkling apple or pear cider;Mint sprigs;Simple syrup

Name: Tropical Sunset
About: Take a sip close your eyes and soak up the sun.
HowToMake: Add the Van Gogh Coconut Vodka Van Gogh Pineapple Vodka and pineapple juice to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake and pour into a Martini glass. Add splash of grenadine and garnish with a pineapple wedge.
Ingredients: Van Gogh Pineapple Vodka;Van Gogh Coconut Vodka;Pineapple juice;Splash of Grenadine

Name: Hydrate
About: You heard the cocktail: Drink up.
HowToMake: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a cucumber slice and mint sprig.
Ingredients: Organic cucumber vodka;Puréed watermelon;Fresh lime juice;Truvia
